trans-unit.source: 3D textures are blitted slice by slice. Slices in the source region bounded by srcOffsets[0].z and srcOffsets[1].z are copied to slices in the destination region bounded by dstOffsets[0].z and dstOffsets[1].z. For each destination slice, a source z coordinate is linearly interpolated between srcOffsets[0].z and srcOffsets[1].z. If the filter parameter is VK_FILTER_LINEAR then the value sampled from the source image is taken by doing linear filtering using the interpolated z coordinate. If filter parameter is VK_FILTER_NEAREST then value sampled from the source image is taken from the single nearest slice (with undefined rounding mode).
trans-unit.target: 3D纹理逐个切片。源区域中的切片由 srcOffsets [0] 界定。 z 和 srcOffsets [1]。 z 被复制到以 dstOffsets [0]为边界的目标区域中的切片。 z 和 dstOffsets [1]。 z 。对于每个目标切片，源z坐标在 srcOffsets [0] 之间线性插值。 z 和 srcOffsets [1]。 z 。如果 filter 参数是 VK_FILTER_LINEAR 然后使用插值的z坐标进行线性滤波即可获取从源图像采样的值。如果 filter 参数为 VK_FILTER_NEAREST ,则从源图像采样的值将从最近的单个切片中获取（使用未定义的舍入模式）。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdCopyQueryPoolResultscan then be called to copy the timestamp value from the query pool into buffer memory, with ordering and synchronization behavior equivalent to how other queries operate. Timestamp values can also be retrieved from the query pool using vkGetQueryPoolResults. As with other queries, the query must be reset using vkCmdResetQueryPool before requesting the timestamp value be written to it.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdCopyQueryPoolResults 可那才叫到时间戳值从查询库复制到缓冲存储器，具有排序和同步行为等同于其他查询是如何运作的。时间戳值可以也可以从使用查询池检索vkGetQueryPoolResults。与其他查询一样，在请求将时间戳值写入之前，必须使用vkCmdResetQueryPool重置查询。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdWaitEvents is used with vkCmdSetEvent to define a memory dependency between two sets of action commands, roughly in the same way as pipeline barriers, but split into two commands such that work between the two may execute unhindered.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdWaitEvents与vkCmdSetEvent一起使用来定义两组动作命令之间的内存依赖关系，大致与流水线屏障相同，但是分成两个命令，以便可以不受阻碍地执行两者之间的工作。

trans-unit.source: vkGetImageSubresourceLayout is invariant for the lifetime of a single image.
trans-unit.target: vkGetImageSubresourceLayout在单个图像的生命周期内是不变的。

trans-unit.source: vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties and vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatPropertiescan be used to check for additional supported properties of individual formats.
trans-unit.target: vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties和vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties 可用于检查单个格式的其他受支持属性。

trans-unit.source: A is a VkComponentSwizzle specifying the component value placed in the A component of the output vector.
trans-unit.target: A 是VkComponentSwizzle，指定放置在输出矢量的A分量中的分量值。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_READ_BIT specifies read access to a color attachment, such as via blending, logic operations, or via certain subpass load operations.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_READ_BIT 指定对颜色附件的读取访问，例如通过混合，逻辑操作或通过某些子遍加载操作。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT specifies write access to a color or resolve attachment during a render pass or via certain subpass load and store operations.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT 指定在渲染过程中或通过某些子过程加载和存储操作对颜色或分辨率附件的写访问。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_READ_BIT specifies read access to a depth/stencil attachment, via depth or stencil operations or via certain subpass load operations.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_READ_BIT 指定通过深度或模板操作或某些子遍加载操作对深度/模板附件的读取访问。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT specifies write access to a depth/stencil attachment, via depth or stencil operations or via certain subpass load and store operations.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT 指定通过深度或模板操作或某些子遍加载和存储操作对深度/模板附件的写访问。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_HOST_READ_BIT specifies read access by a host operation. Accesses of this type are not performed through a resource, but directly on memory.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_HOST_READ_BIT 指定主机操作的读取访问权限。此类访问不是通过资源执行的，而是直接在内存上执行的。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_HOST_WRITE_BIT specifies write access by a host operation. Accesses of this type are not performed through a resource, but directly on memory.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_HOST_WRITE_BIT 指定主机操作的写访问权限。此类访问不是通过资源执行的，而是直接在内存上执行的。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_INDEX_READ_BIT specifies read access to an index buffer as part of an indexed drawing command, bound by vkCmdBindIndexBuffer.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_INDEX_READ_BIT 指定对索引缓冲区的读取访问，作为对索引绘制命令的一部分，受vkCmdBindIndexBuffer约束。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_INDIRECT_COMMAND_READ_BIT specifies read access to an indirect command structure read as part of an indirect drawing or dispatch command.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_INDIRECT_COMMAND_READ_BIT 指定对作为间接图形或调度命令一部分读取的间接命令结构的读取访问权限。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_READ_BIT specifies read access to an input attachment within a renderpass during fragment shading.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_READ_BIT 指定在片段着色期间对渲染通道内的输入附件的读取访问。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_MEMORY_READ_BIT specifies read access via non-specific entities. These entities include the Vulkan device and host, but may also include entities external to the Vulkan device or otherwise not part of the core Vulkan pipeline. When included in a destination access mask, makes all available writes visible to all future read accesses on entities known to the Vulkan device.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_MEMORY_READ_BIT 指定通过非特定实体的读取访问。这些实体包括Vulkan设备和主机，但也可以包括Vulkan设备外部的实体，否则不属于核心Vulkan管道的一部分。当包含在目标访问掩码中时，可使所有可用的写入对于Vulkan设备已知的实体上的所有将来的读取访问可见。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_MEMORY_WRITE_BIT specifies write access via non-specific entities. These entities include the Vulkan device and host, but may also include entities external to the Vulkan device or otherwise not part of the core Vulkan pipeline. When included in a source access mask, all writes that are performed by entities known to the Vulkan device are made available. When included in a destination access mask, makes all available writes visible to all future write accesses on entities known to the Vulkan device.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_MEMORY_WRITE_BIT 指定通过非特定实体的写访问。这些实体包括Vulkan设备和主机，但也可以包括Vulkan设备外部的实体，否则不属于核心Vulkan管道的一部分。当包含在源访问掩码中时，由Vulkan设备已知的实体执行的所有写操作将变为可用。当包含在目标访问掩码中时，使所有可用的写操作对Vulkan设备已知的实体上的所有以后的写访问可见。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_SHADER_READ_BIT specifies read access to a storage buffer, uniform texel buffer, storage texel buffer, sampled image, or storage image.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_SHADER_READ_BIT 指定对存储缓冲区，统一texel缓冲区，存储texel缓冲区，采样图像或存储图像的读取访问。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_SHADER_WRITE_BIT specifies write access to a storage buffer, storage texel buffer, or storage image.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_SHADER_WRITE_BIT 指定对存储缓冲区，存储纹理像素缓冲区或存储映像的写访问。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_TRANSFER_READ_BIT specifies read access to an image or buffer in a copy operation.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_TRANSFER_READ_BIT 指定在复制操作中对图像或缓冲区的读取访问。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_TRANSFER_WRITE_BIT specifies write access to an image or buffer in a clear or copy operation.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_TRANSFER_WRITE_BIT 指定在清除或复制操作中对图像或缓冲区的写访问。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_UNIFORM_READ_BIT specifies read access to a uniform buffer.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_UNIFORM_READ_BIT 指定对统一缓冲区的读取访问。

trans-unit.source: VK_ACCESS_VERTEX_ATTRIBUTE_READ_BIT specifies read access to a vertex buffer as part of a drawing command, bound by vkCmdBindVertexBuffers.
trans-unit.target: VK_ACCESS_VERTEX_ATTRIBUTE_READ_BIT 指定对顶点缓冲区的读取访问，作为绘制命令的一部分，受vkCmdBindVertexBuffers约束。

trans-unit.source: VK_API_VERSION is now commented out of vulkan.h and cannot be used.
trans-unit.target: VK_API_VERSION 现在已从vulkan.h中注释掉，无法使用。

trans-unit.source: VK_API_VERSION_1_0 returns the API version number for Vulkan 1.0. The patch version number in this macro will always be zero. The supported patch version for a physical device can be queried with vkGetPhysicalDeviceProperties.
trans-unit.target: VK_API_VERSION_1_0 返回Vulkan 1.0的API版本号。此宏中的修补程序版本号将始终为零。可以使用vkGetPhysicalDeviceProperties查询物理设备支持的修补程序版本。

trans-unit.source: VK_ATTACHMENT_DESCRIPTION_MAY_ALIAS_BIT specifies that the attachment aliases the same device memory as other attachments.
trans-unit.target: VK_ATTACHMENT_DESCRIPTION_MAY_ALIAS_BIT 指定附件与其他附件别名相同的设备内存。

trans-unit.source: VK_ATTACHMENT_LOAD_OP_CLEAR specifies that the contents within the render area will be cleared to a uniform value, which is specified when a render pass instance is begun. For attachments with a depth/stencil format, this uses the access type VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT. For attachments with a color format, this uses the access type VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT.
trans-unit.target: VK_ATTACHMENT_LOAD_OP_CLEAR 指定将渲染区域内的内容清除为统一值，该值在开始渲染过程实例时指定。对于具有深度/模板格式的附件，此访问类型为 VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT 。对于具有彩色格式的附件，它使用访问类型 VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT 。

trans-unit.source: VK_ATTACHMENT_LOAD_OP_DONT_CARE specifies that the previous contents within the area need not be preserved; the contents of the attachment will be undefined inside the render area. For attachments with a depth/stencil format, this uses the access type VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT. For attachments with a color format, this uses the access type VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT.
trans-unit.target: VK_ATTACHMENT_LOAD_OP_DONT_CARE 指定不需要保留该区域内的先前内容；附件的内容在渲染区域内是未定义的。对于具有深度/模板格式的附件，此访问类型为 VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT 。对于具有彩色格式的附件，它使用访问类型 VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT 。

trans-unit.source: VK_ATTACHMENT_LOAD_OP_LOAD specifies that the previous contents of the image within the render area will be preserved. For attachments with a depth/stencil format, this uses the access type VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_READ_BIT. For attachments with a color format, this uses the access type VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_READ_BIT.
trans-unit.target: VK_ATTACHMENT_LOAD_OP_LOAD 指定将保留渲染区域中图像的先前内容。对于具有深度/模板格式的附件，此访问类型为 VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_READ_BIT 。对于具有彩色格式的附件，它使用访问类型 VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_READ_BIT 。

trans-unit.source: VK_ATTACHMENT_STORE_OP_DONT_CARE specifies the contents within the render area are not needed after rendering, and may be discarded; the contents of the attachment will be undefined inside the render area. For attachments with a depth/stencil format, this uses the access type VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT. For attachments with a color format, this uses the access type VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT.
trans-unit.target: VK_ATTACHMENT_STORE_OP_DONT_CARE 指定渲染后不需要渲染区域内的内容，可以将其丢弃；附件的内容在渲染区域内是未定义的。对于具有深度/模板格式的附件，此访问类型为 VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT 。对于具有彩色格式的附件，它使用访问类型 VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT 。

trans-unit.source: VK_ATTACHMENT_STORE_OP_STORE specifies the contents generated during the render pass and within the render area are written to memory. For attachments with a depth/stencil format, this uses the access type VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT. For attachments with a color format, this uses the access type VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT.
trans-unit.target: VK_ATTACHMENT_STORE_OP_STORE 指定在渲染过程中生成的内容并将渲染区域内的内容写入内存。对于具有深度/模板格式的附件，此访问类型为 VK_ACCESS_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT 。对于具有彩色格式的附件，它使用访问类型 VK_ACCESS_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_WRITE_BIT 。

trans-unit.source: VK_BORDER_COLOR_FLOAT_OPAQUE_BLACK specifies an opaque, floating-point format, black color.
trans-unit.target: VK_BORDER_COLOR_FLOAT_OPAQUE_BLACK 指定不透明的浮点格式黑色。

trans-unit.source: VK_BORDER_COLOR_FLOAT_OPAQUE_WHITE specifies an opaque, floating-point format, white color.
trans-unit.target: VK_BORDER_COLOR_FLOAT_OPAQUE_WHITE 指定不透明的浮点格式白色。

trans-unit.source: VK_BORDER_COLOR_FLOAT_TRANSPARENT_BLACK specifies a transparent, floating-point format, black color.
trans-unit.target: VK_BORDER_COLOR_FLOAT_TRANSPARENT_BLACK 指定透明的浮点格式黑色。

trans-unit.source: VK_BORDER_COLOR_INT_OPAQUE_BLACK specifies an opaque, integer format, black color.
trans-unit.target: VK_BORDER_COLOR_INT_OPAQUE_BLACK 指定不透明的整数格式黑色。

trans-unit.source: VK_BORDER_COLOR_INT_OPAQUE_WHITE specifies an opaque, integer format, white color.
trans-unit.target: VK_BORDER_COLOR_INT_OPAQUE_WHITE 指定不透明的整数格式白色。

trans-unit.source: VK_BORDER_COLOR_INT_TRANSPARENT_BLACK specifies a transparent, integer format, black color.
trans-unit.target: VK_BORDER_COLOR_INT_TRANSPARENT_BLACK 指定透明的整数格式黑色。

trans-unit.source: VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_ALIASED_BIT specifies that the buffer will be backed using sparse memory binding with memory ranges that might also simultaneously be backing another buffer (or another portion of the same buffer). Buffers created with this flag must also be created with the VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT flag.
trans-unit.target: VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_ALIASED_BIT 指定将使用稀疏内存绑定来备份缓冲区，而该内存范围也可能同时备份另一个缓冲区（或同一缓冲区的另一部分）。用该标志创建缓冲区必须也可与创建 VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT 标志。

trans-unit.source: VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT specifies that the buffer will be backed using sparse memory binding.
trans-unit.target: VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT 指定使用稀疏内存绑定来备份缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT specifies that the buffer can be partially backed using sparse memory binding. Buffers created with this flag must also be created with the VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT flag.
trans-unit.target: VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT 指定该缓冲器可被部分地使用稀疏存储器绑定支持。用该标志创建缓冲区必须也可与创建 VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT 标志。

trans-unit.source: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_INDEX_BUFFER_BIT specifies that the buffer is suitable for passing as the buffer parameter to vkCmdBindIndexBuffer.
trans-unit.target: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_INDEX_BUFFER_BIT 指定该缓冲区适合作为 buffer 参数传递给 vkCmdBindIndexBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_INDIRECT_BUFFER_BIT specifies that the buffer is suitable for passing as the buffer parameter to vkCmdDrawIndirect, vkCmdDrawIndexedIndirect, or vkCmdDispatchIndirect.
trans-unit.target: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_INDIRECT_BUFFER_BIT 指定该缓冲区适合作为 buffer 参数传递给 vkCmdDrawIndirect ， vkCmdDrawIndexedIndirect 或 vkCmdDispatchIndirect 。

trans-unit.source: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_STORAGE_BUFFER_BIT specifies that the buffer can be used in a VkDescriptorBufferInfo suitable for occupying a VkDescriptorSet slot either of type VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_BUFFER or VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_BUFFER_DYNAMIC.
trans-unit.target: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_STORAGE_BUFFER_BIT 指定可以在 VkDescriptorBufferInfo 中使用缓冲区，以适合于占用 VkDescriptorSet 类型或 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_BUFFER_DYNAMIC 类型的 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_BUFFER 插槽。

trans-unit.source: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER_BIT specifies that the buffer can be used to create a VkBufferView suitable for occupying a VkDescriptorSet slot of type VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER.
trans-unit.target: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER_BIT 指定缓冲区可以被用来创建一个 VkBufferView 适于占据 VkDescriptorSet 类型的插槽 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER 。

trans-unit.source: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT specifies that the buffer can be used as the destination of a transfer command.
trans-unit.target: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT 指定该缓冲器可被用作传输命令的目的地。

trans-unit.source: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT specifies that the buffer can be used as the source of a transfer command (see the definition of VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TRANSFER_BIT).
trans-unit.target: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT 指定缓冲区可以用作传输命令的源（请参阅 VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TRANSFER_BIT 的定义）。

trans-unit.source: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_UNIFORM_BUFFER_BIT specifies that the buffer can be used in a VkDescriptorBufferInfo suitable for occupying a VkDescriptorSet slot either of type VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_BUFFER or VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_BUFFER_DYNAMIC.
trans-unit.target: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_UNIFORM_BUFFER_BIT 指定可以在 VkDescriptorBufferInfo 中使用该缓冲区，以适合占用 VkDescriptorSet 类型或 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_BUFFER_DYNAMIC 类型的 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_BUFFER 插槽。

trans-unit.source: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_UNIFORM_TEXEL_BUFFER_BIT specifies that the buffer can be used to create a VkBufferView suitable for occupying a VkDescriptorSet slot of type VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_TEXEL_BUFFER.
trans-unit.target: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_UNIFORM_TEXEL_BUFFER_BIT 指定缓冲区可以被用来创建一个 VkBufferView 适于占据 VkDescriptorSet 类型的插槽 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_TEXEL_BUFFER 。

trans-unit.source: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_VERTEX_BUFFER_BIT specifies that the buffer is suitable for passing as an element of the pBuffers array to vkCmdBindVertexBuffers.
trans-unit.target: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_VERTEX_BUFFER_BIT 指定该缓冲区适合作为 pBuffers 数组的元素传递到 vkCmdBindVertexBuffers 。

trans-unit.source: VK_COLOR_COMPONENT_A_BIT specifies that the A value is written to the color attachment for the appropriate sample. Otherwise, the value in memory is unmodified.
trans-unit.target: VK_COLOR_COMPONENT_A_BIT 指定将A值写入相应样本的颜色附件。否则，内存中的值将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: VK_COLOR_COMPONENT_B_BIT specifies that the B value is written to the color attachment for the appropriate sample. Otherwise, the value in memory is unmodified.
trans-unit.target: VK_COLOR_COMPONENT_B_BIT 指定将B值写入适当样本的颜色附件。否则，内存中的值将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: VK_COLOR_COMPONENT_G_BIT specifies that the G value is written to the color attachment for the appropriate sample. Otherwise, the value in memory is unmodified.
trans-unit.target: VK_COLOR_COMPONENT_G_BIT 指定将G值写入相应样本的颜色附件。否则，内存中的值将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: VK_COLOR_COMPONENT_R_BIT specifies that the R value is written to the color attachment for the appropriate sample. Otherwise, the value in memory is unmodified.
trans-unit.target: VK_COLOR_COMPONENT_R_BIT 指定将R值写入适当样本的颜色附件。否则，内存中的值将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_LEVEL_PRIMARY specifies a primary command buffer.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_LEVEL_PRIMARY 指定主命令缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_LEVEL_SECONDARY specifies a secondary command buffer.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_LEVEL_SECONDARY 指定辅助命令缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_RESET_RELEASE_RESOURCES_BIT specifies that most or all memory resources currently owned by the command buffer should be returned to the parent command pool. If this flag is not set, then the command buffer may hold onto memory resources and reuse them when recording commands. commandBuffer is moved to the initial state.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_RESET_RELEASE_RESOURCES_BIT 指定应将命令缓冲区当前拥有的大部分或所有内存资源返回到父命​​令池。如果未设置此标志，则命令缓冲区可以保留内存资源，并在记录命令时重新使用它们。 commandBuffer 移至初始状态。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_ONE_TIME_SUBMIT_BIT specifies that each recording of the command buffer will only be submitted once, and the command buffer will be reset and recorded again between each submission.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_ONE_TIME_SUBMIT_BIT 指定命令缓冲区的每个记录将只提交一次，并且命令缓冲区将被重置并在每次提交之间再次记录。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_RENDER_PASS_CONTINUE_BIT specifies that a secondary command buffer is considered to be entirely inside a render pass. If this is a primary command buffer, then this bit is ignored.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_RENDER_PASS_CONTINUE_BIT 指定将辅助命令缓冲区视为完全位于渲染过程中。如果这是主要命令缓冲区，则忽略此位。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT specifies that a command buffer can be resubmitted to a queue while it is in the pending state, and recorded into multiple primary command buffers.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_USAGE_SIMULTANEOUS_USE_BIT 指定在处于挂起状态时可以将命令缓冲区重新提交到队列，并记录到多个主要命令缓冲区中。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMMAND_POOL_CREATE_RESET_COMMAND_BUFFER_BIT allows any command buffer allocated from a pool to be individually reset to the initial state; either by calling vkResetCommandBuffer, or via the implicit reset when calling vkBeginCommandBuffer. If this flag is not set on a pool, then vkResetCommandBuffermust not be called for any command buffer allocated from that pool.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMMAND_POOL_CREATE_RESET_COMMAND_BUFFER_BIT 允许将从池中分配的任何命令缓冲区分别重置为初始状态；通过调用vkResetCommandBuffer或在调用vkBeginCommandBuffer时通过隐式重置。如果该标志不是在泳池旁，然后 vkResetCommandBuffer 一定不能要求从池中分配的任何命令缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMMAND_POOL_CREATE_TRANSIENT_BIT indicates that command buffers allocated from the pool will be short-lived, meaning that they will be reset or freed in a relatively short timeframe. This flag may be used by the implementation to control memory allocation behavior within the pool.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMMAND_POOL_CREATE_TRANSIENT_BIT 指示从池中分配的命令缓冲区将是短期的，这意味着它们将在相对较短的时间内重置或释放。该标记可以由实现用来控制池中的内存分配行为。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMMAND_POOL_RESET_RELEASE_RESOURCES_BIT specifies that resetting a command pool recycles all of the resources from the command pool back to the system.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMMAND_POOL_RESET_RELEASE_RESOURCES_BIT 指定重置命令池会将所有资源从命令池循环回系统。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPARE_OP_ALWAYS specifies that the test always passes.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPARE_OP_ALWAYS 指定测试始终通过。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPARE_OP_EQUAL specifies that the test passes when R = S.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPARE_OP_EQUAL 指定当R = S时测试通过。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPARE_OP_GREATER specifies that the test passes when R > S.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPARE_OP_GREATER 指定当R> S时测试通过。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPARE_OP_GREATER_OR_EQUAL specifies that the test passes when R ≥ S.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPARE_OP_GREATER_OR_EQUAL 指定当R≥S时测试通过。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPARE_OP_LESS specifies that the test passes when R < S.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPARE_OP_LESS 指定当R <S时测试通过。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPARE_OP_LESS_OR_EQUAL specifies that the test passes when R ≤ S.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPARE_OP_LESS_OR_EQUAL 指定当R≤S时测试通过。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPARE_OP_NEVER specifies that the test never passes.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPARE_OP_NEVER 指定测试永不通过。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPARE_OP_NOT_EQUAL specifies that the test passes when R ≠ S.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPARE_OP_NOT_EQUAL 指定当R≠S时测试通过。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_A specifies that the component is set to the value of the A component of the image.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_A 指定将该分量设置为图像的A分量的值。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_B specifies that the component is set to the value of the B component of the image.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_B 指定将分量设置为图像的B分量的值。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_G specifies that the component is set to the value of the G component of the image.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_G 指定将分量设置为图像的G分量的值。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_IDENTITY specifies that the component is set to the identity swizzle.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_IDENTITY 指定将该组件设置为身份标识。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_ONE specifies that the component is set to either 1 or 1.0, depending on whether the type of the image view format is integer or floating-point respectively, as determined by the Format Definition section for each VkFormat.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_ONE 指定组件设置为1还是1.0，具体取决于图像视图格式的类型分别是整数还是浮点（由每个VkFormat的“ 格式定义”部分确定）。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_R specifies that the component is set to the value of the R component of the image.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_R 指定将该分量设置为图像的R分量的值。

trans-unit.source: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_ZERO specifies that the component is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: VK_COMPONENT_SWIZZLE_ZERO 指定将该组件设置为零。

trans-unit.source: VK_CULL_MODE_BACK_BIT specifies that back-facing triangles are discarded
trans-unit.target: VK_CULL_MODE_BACK_BIT 指定丢弃背面三角形

trans-unit.source: VK_CULL_MODE_FRONT_AND_BACK specifies that all triangles are discarded.
trans-unit.target: VK_CULL_MODE_FRONT_AND_BACK 指定丢弃所有三角形。

trans-unit.source: VK_CULL_MODE_FRONT_BIT specifies that front-facing triangles are discarded
trans-unit.target: VK_CULL_MODE_FRONT_BIT 指定丢弃前面的三角形

trans-unit.source: VK_CULL_MODE_NONE specifies that no triangles are discarded
trans-unit.target: VK_CULL_MODE_NONE 指定不丢弃任何三角形

trans-unit.source: VK_DEFINE_HANDLE defines a dispatchable handle type.
trans-unit.target: VK_DEFINE_HANDLE 定义可调度句柄类型。

trans-unit.source: VK_DEFINE_NON_DISPATCHABLE_HANDLE defines a non-dispatchable handle type.
trans-unit.target: VK_DEFINE_NON_DISPATCHABLE_HANDLE 定义了不可分派的句柄类型。

trans-unit.source: VK_DEPENDENCY_BY_REGION_BIT specifies that dependencies will be framebuffer-local.
trans-unit.target: VK_DEPENDENCY_BY_REGION_BIT 指定依赖项将是本地帧缓冲的。

trans-unit.source: VK_DESCRIPTOR_POOL_CREATE_FREE_DESCRIPTOR_SET_BIT specifies that descriptor sets can return their individual allocations to the pool, i.e. all of vkAllocateDescriptorSets, vkFreeDescriptorSets, and vkResetDescriptorPool are allowed. Otherwise, descriptor sets allocated from the pool must not be individually freed back to the pool, i.e. only vkAllocateDescriptorSets and vkResetDescriptorPool are allowed.
trans-unit.target: VK_DESCRIPTOR_POOL_CREATE_FREE_DESCRIPTOR_SET_BIT 指定描述符集可以将其各自的分配返回给池，即，所有vkAllocateDescriptorSets，vkFreeDescriptorSets和vkResetDescriptorPool都被允许。否则，从池中分配的描述符集一定不能单独释放回池中，即只有vkAllocateDescriptorSets和vkResetDescriptorPool是允许的。

trans-unit.source: VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLER, VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_COMBINED_IMAGE_SAMPLER, VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLED_IMAGE, VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_IMAGE, or VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT specify that the elements of the VkWriteDescriptorSet::pImageInfo array of VkDescriptorImageInfo structures will be used to update the descriptors, and other arrays will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLER ， VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_COMBINED_IMAGE_SAMPLER ， VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLED_IMAGE ， VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_IMAGE ，或 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT 指定该的元素VkWriteDescriptorSet :: pImageInfo 的阵列VkDescriptorImageInfo结构将被用于更新描述符和其它阵列将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_BUFFER, VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_BUFFER, VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_BUFFER_DYNAMIC, or VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_BUFFER_DYNAMIC specify that the elements of the VkWriteDescriptorSet::pBufferInfo array of VkDescriptorBufferInfo structures will be used to update the descriptors, and other arrays will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_BUFFER ， VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_BUFFER ， VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_BUFFER_DYNAMIC ，或 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_BUFFER_DYNAMIC 指定该的元素VkWriteDescriptorSet :: pBufferInfo 的阵列VkDescriptorBufferInfo结构将被用于更新描述符和其它阵列将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_TEXEL_BUFFER or VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER specify that the VkWriteDescriptorSet::pTexelBufferView array will be used to update the descriptors, and other arrays will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_TEXEL_BUFFER 或 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER 指定VkWriteDescriptorSet :: pTexelBufferView 数组将用于更新描述符，其他数组将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_BLEND_CONSTANTS specifies that the blendConstants state in VkPipelineColorBlendStateCreateInfo will be ignored and must be set dynamically with vkCmdSetBlendConstants before any draws are performed with a pipeline state with VkPipelineColorBlendAttachmentState member blendEnable set to VK_TRUE and any of the blend functions using a constant blend color.
trans-unit.target: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_BLEND_CONSTANTS 指明所述 blendConstants 在状态 VkPipelineColorBlendStateCreateInfo 将被忽略并且必须可与动态地设置vkCmdSetBlendConstants之前任何抽奖与具有流水线状态下进行 VkPipelineColorBlendAttachmentState 构件 blendEnable 集到 VK_TRUE 和任何的使用恒定混合色的混合函数。

trans-unit.source: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_DEPTH_BIAS specifies that the depthBiasConstantFactor, depthBiasClamp and depthBiasSlopeFactor states in VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateInfo will be ignored and must be set dynamically with vkCmdSetDepthBias before any draws are performed with depthBiasEnable in VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateInfo set to VK_TRUE.
trans-unit.target: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_DEPTH_BIAS 指定的 depthBiasConstantFactor ， depthBiasClamp 和 depthBiasSlopeFactor 国 VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateInfo 将被忽略，必须与动态设置vkCmdSetDepthBias之前的任何绘制与执行 depthBiasEnable 在 VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateInfo 设置为 VK_TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_DEPTH_BOUNDS specifies that the minDepthBounds and maxDepthBounds states of VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo will be ignored and must be set dynamically with vkCmdSetDepthBounds before any draws are performed with a pipeline state with VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo member depthBoundsTestEnable set to VK_TRUE.
trans-unit.target: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_DEPTH_BOUNDS 指定的 minDepthBounds 和 maxDepthBounds 的状态VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo将被忽略，必须与动态设置vkCmdSetDepthBounds之前的任何抽奖都与一个流水线状态进行 VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo 成员 depthBoundsTestEnable 设置为 VK_TRUE 。

trans-unit.source: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_LINE_WIDTH specifies that the lineWidth state in VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateInfo will be ignored and must be set dynamically with vkCmdSetLineWidth before any draw commands that generate line primitives for the rasterizer.
trans-unit.target: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_LINE_WIDTH 指明所述 lineWidth 状态 VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateInfo 将被忽略，必须与动态设置vkCmdSetLineWidth产生的光栅线图元绘制的任何命令之前。

trans-unit.source: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_SCISSOR specifies that the pScissors state in VkPipelineViewportStateCreateInfo will be ignored and must be set dynamically with vkCmdSetScissor before any draw commands. The number of scissor rectangles used by a pipeline is still specified by the scissorCount member of VkPipelineViewportStateCreateInfo.
trans-unit.target: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_SCISSOR 指定的 pScissors 状态 VkPipelineViewportStateCreateInfo 将被忽略，必须与动态设置vkCmdSetScissor任何绘图命令之前。通过管道使用剪刀矩形的数目仍然是由指定 scissorCount 的构件 VkPipelineViewportStateCreateInfo 。

trans-unit.source: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_STENCIL_COMPARE_MASK specifies that the compareMask state in VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo for both front and back will be ignored and must be set dynamically with vkCmdSetStencilCompareMask before any draws are performed with a pipeline state with VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo member stencilTestEnable set to VK_TRUE
trans-unit.target: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_STENCIL_COMPARE_MASK 指定的 compareMask 状态 VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo 两个 front 和 back 会被忽略，必须与动态设置vkCmdSetStencilCompareMask之前的任何抽奖都与一个流水线状态进行 VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo 成员 stencilTestEnable 设置为 VK_TRUE

trans-unit.source: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_STENCIL_REFERENCE specifies that the reference state in VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo for both front and back will be ignored and must be set dynamically with vkCmdSetStencilReference before any draws are performed with a pipeline state with VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo member stencilTestEnable set to VK_TRUE
trans-unit.target: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_STENCIL_REFERENCE 指明所述 reference 状态 VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo 两个 front 和 back 将被忽略，必须与动态设置vkCmdSetStencilReference之前任何抽奖与具有流水线状态下进行 VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo 构件 stencilTestEnable 集到 VK_TRUE

trans-unit.source: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_STENCIL_WRITE_MASK specifies that the writeMask state in VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo for both front and back will be ignored and must be set dynamically with vkCmdSetStencilWriteMask before any draws are performed with a pipeline state with VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo member stencilTestEnable set to VK_TRUE
trans-unit.target: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_STENCIL_WRITE_MASK 指定的 writeMask 状态 VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo 两个 front 和 back 会被忽略，必须与动态设置vkCmdSetStencilWriteMask之前的任何抽奖都与一个流水线状态进行 VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateInfo 成员 stencilTestEnable 设置为 VK_TRUE

trans-unit.source: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_VIEWPORT specifies that the pViewports state in VkPipelineViewportStateCreateInfo will be ignored and must be set dynamically with vkCmdSetViewport before any draw commands. The number of viewports used by a pipeline is still specified by the viewportCount member of VkPipelineViewportStateCreateInfo.
trans-unit.target: VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_VIEWPORT 指定的 pViewports 状态 VkPipelineViewportStateCreateInfo 将被忽略，必须与动态设置vkCmdSetViewport任何绘图命令之前。管道使用的视口数量仍由 VkPipelineViewportStateCreateInfo 的 viewportCount 成员指定。

trans-unit.source: VK_ERROR_DEVICE_LOST The logical or physical device has been lost. See Lost Device
trans-unit.target: VK_ERROR_DEVICE_LOST 逻辑或物理设备已丢失。查看丢失的设备

trans-unit.source: VK_ERROR_EXTENSION_NOT_PRESENT A requested extension is not supported.
trans-unit.target: VK_ERROR_EXTENSION_NOT_PRESENT 不支持请求的扩展名。

trans-unit.source: VK_ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_PRESENT A requested feature is not supported.
trans-unit.target: VK_ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_PRESENT 不支持所请求的功能。

trans-unit.source: VK_ERROR_FORMAT_NOT_SUPPORTED A requested format is not supported on this device.
trans-unit.target: VK_ERROR_FORMAT_NOT_SUPPORTED 该设备不支持请求的格式。

trans-unit.source: VK_ERROR_FRAGMENTED_POOL A pool allocation has failed due to fragmentation of the pool’s memory. This must only be returned if no attempt to allocate host or device memory was made to accomodate the new allocation.
trans-unit.target: VK_ERROR_FRAGMENTED_POOL 由于池内存碎片，导致池分配失败。这必须，如果没有尝试分配主机或设备的内存，以适应新的分配才能返回。

trans-unit.source: VK_ERROR_INCOMPATIBLE_DRIVER The requested version of Vulkan is not supported by the driver or is otherwise incompatible for implementation-specific reasons.
trans-unit.target: VK_ERROR_INCOMPATIBLE_DRIVER 驱动程序不支持请求的Vulkan版本，或者由于特定于实现的原因而与其他版本不兼容。

trans-unit.source: VK_ERROR_INITIALIZATION_FAILED Initialization of an object could not be completed for implementation-specific reasons.
trans-unit.target: VK_ERROR_INITIALIZATION_FAILED 由于特定于实现的原因，无法完成对象的初始化。

trans-unit.source: VK_ERROR_LAYER_NOT_PRESENT A requested layer is not present or could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: VK_ERROR_LAYER_NOT_PRESENT 请求的图层不存在或无法加载。

trans-unit.source: VK_ERROR_MEMORY_MAP_FAILED Mapping of a memory object has failed.
trans-unit.target: VK_ERROR_MEMORY_MAP_FAILED 内存对象的映射失败。

trans-unit.source: VK_ERROR_OUT_OF_DEVICE_MEMORY A device memory allocation has failed.
trans-unit.target: VK_ERROR_OUT_OF_DEVICE_MEMORY 设备内存分配失败。

trans-unit.source: VK_ERROR_OUT_OF_HOST_MEMORY A host memory allocation has failed.
trans-unit.target: VK_ERROR_OUT_OF_HOST_MEMORY 主机内存分配失败。

trans-unit.source: VK_ERROR_TOO_MANY_OBJECTS Too many objects of the type have already been created.
trans-unit.target: VK_ERROR_TOO_MANY_OBJECTS 已经创建了太多类型的对象。

trans-unit.source: VK_EVENT_RESET An event is unsignaled
trans-unit.target: VK_EVENT_RESET 事件未发出信号

trans-unit.source: VK_EVENT_SET An event is signaled
trans-unit.target: VK_EVENT_SET 发出事件信号

trans-unit.source: VK_FENCE_CREATE_SIGNALED_BIT specifies that the fence object is created in the signaled state. Otherwise, it is created in the unsignaled state.
trans-unit.target: VK_FENCE_CREATE_SIGNALED_BIT 指定在信号状态下创建围栅对象。否则，它将以无信号状态创建。

trans-unit.source: VK_FILTER_LINEAR specifies linear filtering.
trans-unit.target: VK_FILTER_LINEAR 指定线性过滤。

trans-unit.source: VK_FILTER_NEAREST specifies nearest filtering.
trans-unit.target: VK_FILTER_NEAREST 指定最近的过滤。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A1R5G5B5_UNORM_PACK16 specifies a four-component, 16-bit packed unsigned normalized format that has a 1-bit A component in bit 15, a 5-bit R component in bits 10..14, a 5-bit G component in bits 5..9, and a 5-bit B component in bits 0..4.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A1R5G5B5_UNORM_PACK16 指定一种四分量，16位打包的无符号归一化格式，该格式在第15位具有1位A分量，在第10..14位具有5位R分量，在第5位具有5位G分量。 9，以及位0..4中的5位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A2B10G10R10_SINT_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed signed integer format that has a 2-bit A component in bits 30..31, a 10-bit B component in bits 20..29, a 10-bit G component in bits 10..19, and a 10-bit R component in bits 0..9.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A2B10G10R10_SINT_PACK32 指定一种四分量，32位打包的带符号整数格式，在位30..31中具有2位A分量，在位20..29中具有10位B分量，而在位中具有10位G分量10..19，以及位0..9中的10位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A2B10G10R10_SNORM_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed signed normalized format that has a 2-bit A component in bits 30..31, a 10-bit B component in bits 20..29, a 10-bit G component in bits 10..19, and a 10-bit R component in bits 0..9.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A2B10G10R10_SNORM_PACK32 指定一种四分量，32位打包有符号归一化格式，该格式的第30..31位为2位A分量，第20..29位为10位B分量，第10位为G位分量10..19，以及位0..9中的10位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A2B10G10R10_SSCALED_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed signed scaled integer format that has a 2-bit A component in bits 30..31, a 10-bit B component in bits 20..29, a 10-bit G component in bits 10..19, and a 10-bit R component in bits 0..9.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A2B10G10R10_SSCALED_PACK32 指定一种四分量，32位打包的带符号缩放的整数格式，该格式在30..31位中具有2位A分量，在20..29位中具有10位B分量，在10位中具有10位G分量。位10..19，以及位0..9中的10位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A2B10G10R10_UINT_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed unsigned integer format that has a 2-bit A component in bits 30..31, a 10-bit B component in bits 20..29, a 10-bit G component in bits 10..19, and a 10-bit R component in bits 0..9.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A2B10G10R10_UINT_PACK32 指定四分量，32位打包的无符号整数格式，其在30..31位中具有2位A分量，在20..29位中具有10位B分量，在10位中具有10位G分量。 10..19，以及位0..9中的10位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A2B10G10R10_UNORM_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed unsigned normalized format that has a 2-bit A component in bits 30..31, a 10-bit B component in bits 20..29, a 10-bit G component in bits 10..19, and a 10-bit R component in bits 0..9.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A2B10G10R10_UNORM_PACK32 指定一种四分量，32位打包的无符号归一化格式，在位30..31中具有2位A分量，在位20..29中具有10位B分量，而在位中具有10位G分量10..19，以及位0..9中的10位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A2B10G10R10_USCALED_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed unsigned scaled integer format that has a 2-bit A component in bits 30..31, a 10-bit B component in bits 20..29, a 10-bit G component in bits 10..19, and a 10-bit R component in bits 0..9.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A2B10G10R10_USCALED_PACK32 指定四分量，32位打包的无符号可缩放整数格式，其在30..31位中具有2位A分量，在20..29位中具有10位B分量，在20..29位中具有10位G分量。位10..19，以及位0..9中的10位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_SINT_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed signed integer format that has a 2-bit A component in bits 30..31, a 10-bit R component in bits 20..29, a 10-bit G component in bits 10..19, and a 10-bit B component in bits 0..9.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_SINT_PACK32 指定四分量，32位打包的带符号整数格式，其在30..31位中具有2位A分量，在20..29位中具有10位R分量，在10位中具有10位G分量10..19，以及位0..9中的10位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_SNORM_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed signed normalized format that has a 2-bit A component in bits 30..31, a 10-bit R component in bits 20..29, a 10-bit G component in bits 10..19, and a 10-bit B component in bits 0..9.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_SNORM_PACK32 指定一种四分量，32位打包的有符号归一化格式，在位30..31中具有2位A分量，在位20..29中具有10位R分量，而在位中具有10位G分量。 10..19，以及位0..9中的10位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_SSCALED_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed signed scaled integer format that has a 2-bit A component in bits 30..31, a 10-bit R component in bits 20..29, a 10-bit G component in bits 10..19, and a 10-bit B component in bits 0..9.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_SSCALED_PACK32 指定具有以比特30..31 2比特的A组分的四组分的32位打包签署缩放整数格式，以位20..29一个10位R分量，在一个10位的G分量位10..19，以及位0..9中的10位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_UINT_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed unsigned integer format that has a 2-bit A component in bits 30..31, a 10-bit R component in bits 20..29, a 10-bit G component in bits 10..19, and a 10-bit B component in bits 0..9.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_UINT_PACK32 指定四种成分，32位打包，其具有在比特30..31一个2位的A组分的无符号整数格式，以位20..29一个10位R分量，以位为一个10位的G分量10..19，以及位0..9中的10位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_UNORM_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed unsigned normalized format that has a 2-bit A component in bits 30..31, a 10-bit R component in bits 20..29, a 10-bit G component in bits 10..19, and a 10-bit B component in bits 0..9.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_UNORM_PACK32 指定四种成分，32位无符号打包规范化格式具有在比特30..31 2比特A组分，以位20..29一个10位R分量，以位为一个10位的G分量10..19，以及位0..9中的10位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_USCALED_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed unsigned scaled integer format that has a 2-bit A component in bits 30..31, a 10-bit R component in bits 20..29, a 10-bit G component in bits 10..19, and a 10-bit B component in bits 0..9.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_USCALED_PACK32 指定四分量，32位打包的无符号可缩放整数格式，其在30..31位中具有2位A分量，在20..29位中具有10位R分量，在20..29位中具有10位G分量。位10..19，以及位0..9中的10位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_SINT_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed signed integer format that has an 8-bit A component in bits 24..31, an 8-bit B component in bits 16..23, an 8-bit G component in bits 8..15, and an 8-bit R component in bits 0..7.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_SINT_PACK32 指定四分量，32位打包的带符号整数格式，其在24..31位中具有8位A分量，在16..23位中具有8位B分量，在8位中具有8位G分量8..15，以及位0..7中的8位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_SNORM_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed signed normalized format that has an 8-bit A component in bits 24..31, an 8-bit B component in bits 16..23, an 8-bit G component in bits 8..15, and an 8-bit R component in bits 0..7.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_SNORM_PACK32 指定一种四分量，32位打包的带符号归一化格式，该格式在位24..31中具有8位A分量，在位16..23中具有8位B分量，而在位中具有8位G分量。 8..15，以及位0..7中的8位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_SRGB_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed unsigned normalized format that has an 8-bit A component in bits 24..31, an 8-bit B component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in bits 16..23, an 8-bit G component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in bits 8..15, and an 8-bit R component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in bits 0..7.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_SRGB_PACK32 指定一种四分量，32位打包的无符号归一化格式，在位24..31中具有8位A分量，在位16..23中具有sRGB非线性编码存储的8位B分量，即8位使用sRGB非线性编码存储在位8..15中的G位分量，以及使用sRGB非线性编码存储的8位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_SSCALED_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed signed scaled integer format that has an 8-bit A component in bits 24..31, an 8-bit B component in bits 16..23, an 8-bit G component in bits 8..15, and an 8-bit R component in bits 0..7.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_SSCALED_PACK32 指定四分量，32位打包的带符号缩放的整数格式，该格式在24..31位中具有8位A分量，在16..23位中具有8位B分量，在8位中具有8位G分量。位8..15，以及位0..7中的8位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_UINT_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed unsigned integer format that has an 8-bit A component in bits 24..31, an 8-bit B component in bits 16..23, an 8-bit G component in bits 8..15, and an 8-bit R component in bits 0..7.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_UINT_PACK32 指定四分量，32位打包的无符号整数格式，该格式在24..31位中具有8位A分量，在16..23位中具有8位B分量，在8位中具有8位G分量。 8..15，以及位0..7中的8位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_UNORM_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed unsigned normalized format that has an 8-bit A component in bits 24..31, an 8-bit B component in bits 16..23, an 8-bit G component in bits 8..15, and an 8-bit R component in bits 0..7.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_UNORM_PACK32 指定一种四分量，32位打包的无符号归一化格式，其在24..31位中具有8位A分量，在16..23位中具有8位B分量，在8位中具有8位G分量。 8..15，以及位0..7中的8位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_USCALED_PACK32 specifies a four-component, 32-bit packed unsigned scaled integer format that has an 8-bit A component in bits 24..31, an 8-bit B component in bits 16..23, an 8-bit G component in bits 8..15, and an 8-bit R component in bits 0..7.

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_B10G11R11_UFLOAT_PACK32 specifies a three-component, 32-bit packed unsigned floating-point format that has a 10-bit B component in bits 22..31, an 11-bit G component in bits 11..21, an 11-bit R component in bits 0..10. See html/vkspec.html#fundamentals-fp10 and html/vkspec.html#fundamentals-fp11.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_B10G11R11_UFLOAT_PACK32 指定三分量，32位打包的无符号浮点格式，该格式在第22..31位具有10位B分量，在第11..21位具有11位G分量，在11位是R分量在位0..10。请参阅html / vkspec.html＃fundamentals-fp10和html / vkspec.html＃fundamentals-fp11。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_B4G4R4A4_UNORM_PACK16 specifies a four-component, 16-bit packed unsigned normalized format that has a 4-bit B component in bits 12..15, a 4-bit G component in bits 8..11, a 4-bit R component in bits 4..7, and a 4-bit A component in bits 0..3.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_B4G4R4A4_UNORM_PACK16 指定一种四分量，16位打包的无符号归一化格式，该格式在位12..15中具有4位B分量，在位8..11中具有4位G分量，而在位中具有4位R分量4..7，以及位0..3中的4位A分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_B5G5R5A1_UNORM_PACK16 specifies a four-component, 16-bit packed unsigned normalized format that has a 5-bit B component in bits 11..15, a 5-bit G component in bits 6..10, a 5-bit R component in bits 1..5, and a 1-bit A component in bit 0.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_B5G5R5A1_UNORM_PACK16 指定一种四分量，16位打包的无符号归一化格式，该格式在位11..15中具有5位B分量，在位6..10中具有5位G分量，而在位中具有5位R分量。 1..5，以及位0中的1位A分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_B5G6R5_UNORM_PACK16 specifies a three-component, 16-bit packed unsigned normalized format that has a 5-bit B component in bits 11..15, a 6-bit G component in bits 5..10, and a 5-bit R component in bits 0..4.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_B5G6R5_UNORM_PACK16 指定三分量，16位打包的无符号归一化格式，该格式在第11..15位具有5位B分量，在第5..10位具有6位G分量，而在5.10中具有5位R分量。位0..4。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_B8G8R8A8_SINT specifies a four-component, 32-bit signed integer format that has an 8-bit B component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, an 8-bit R component in byte 2, and an 8-bit A component in byte 3.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_B8G8R8A8_SINT 指定一种四分量的32位带符号整数格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位B分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位R分量，并且具有8位字节3中的组件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_B8G8R8A8_SNORM specifies a four-component, 32-bit signed normalized format that has an 8-bit B component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, an 8-bit R component in byte 2, and an 8-bit A component in byte 3.

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_B8G8R8A8_SRGB specifies a four-component, 32-bit unsigned normalized format that has an 8-bit B component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in byte 0, an 8-bit G component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in byte 1, an 8-bit R component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in byte 2, and an 8-bit A component in byte 3.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_B8G8R8A8_SRGB 指定一种四分量，32位无符号归一化格式，该格式具有在字节0中以sRGB非线性编码存储的8位B分量，在字节1中以sRGB非线性编码存储的8位G分量，8位R字节2中使用sRGB非线性编码存储的分量，字节3中使用8位A分量存储的分量。

trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_B8G8R8_UNORM 指定一种三分量，24位无符号归一化格式，在字节0中具有8位B分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_B8G8R8_USCALED specifies a three-component, 24-bit unsigned scaled format that has an 8-bit B component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, and an 8-bit R component in byte 2.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_B8G8R8_USCALED 指定一种三分量，24位无符号缩放格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位B分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC1_RGBA_SRGB_BLOCK specifies a four-component, block-compressed format where each 64-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGB texel data with sRGB nonlinear encoding, and provides 1 bit of alpha.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC1_RGBA_SRGB_BLOCK 指定一种四分量，块压缩格式，其中每个64位压缩texel块使用sRGB非线性编码对4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGB texel数据进行编码，并提供1位alpha。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC1_RGBA_UNORM_BLOCK specifies a four-component, block-compressed format where each 64-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGB texel data, and provides 1 bit of alpha.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC1_RGBA_UNORM_BLOCK 指定一种四分量，块压缩格式，其中每个64位压缩纹理像素编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGB纹理像素数据，并提供1位alpha。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC1_RGB_SRGB_BLOCK specifies a three-component, block-compressed format where each 64-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGB texel data with sRGB nonlinear encoding. This format has no alpha and is considered opaque.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC1_RGB_SRGB_BLOCK 指定一种三分量，块压缩格式，其中每个64位压缩texel块使用sRGB非线性编码对4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGB texel数据进行编码。此格式没有Alpha，并且被认为是不透明的。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC1_RGB_UNORM_BLOCK specifies a three-component, block-compressed format where each 64-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGB texel data. This format has no alpha and is considered opaque.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC1_RGB_UNORM_BLOCK 指定一种三分量，块压缩格式，其中每个64位压缩纹理像素块编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGB纹理像素数据。此格式没有Alpha，并且被认为是不透明的。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC2_SRGB_BLOCK specifies a four-component, block-compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGBA texel data with the first 64 bits encoding alpha values followed by 64 bits encoding RGB values with sRGB nonlinear encoding.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC2_SRGB_BLOCK 指定一种四分量，块压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩的texel块编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGBA texel数据，其中前64位编码为alpha值，其后为64位编码为sRGB非线性编码的RGB值。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC2_UNORM_BLOCK specifies a four-component, block-compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGBA texel data with the first 64 bits encoding alpha values followed by 64 bits encoding RGB values.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC2_UNORM_BLOCK 指定一种四分量，块压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩纹理像素编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGBA纹理数据，其中前64位编码alpha值，然后64位编码RGB值。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC3_SRGB_BLOCK specifies a four-component, block-compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGBA texel data with the first 64 bits encoding alpha values followed by 64 bits encoding RGB values with sRGB nonlinear encoding.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC3_SRGB_BLOCK 指定一种四分量，块压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩的texel块编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGBA texel数据，其中前64位编码为alpha值，其后为64位编码为sRGB非线性编码的RGB值。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC3_UNORM_BLOCK specifies a four-component, block-compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGBA texel data with the first 64 bits encoding alpha values followed by 64 bits encoding RGB values.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC3_UNORM_BLOCK 指定一种四分量，块压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩纹理像素编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGBA纹理数据，其中前64位编码alpha值，然后64位编码RGB值。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC4_SNORM_BLOCK specifies a one-component, block-compressed format where each 64-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of signed normalized red texel data.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC4_SNORM_BLOCK 指定一种单分量块压缩格式，其中每个64位压缩纹理像素块对一个4×4矩形的有符号归一化红色纹理像素数据进行编码。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC4_UNORM_BLOCK specifies a one-component, block-compressed format where each 64-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized red texel data.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC4_UNORM_BLOCK 指定一种单分量块压缩格式，其中每个64位压缩纹理像素块编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化红色纹理像素数据。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC5_SNORM_BLOCK specifies a two-component, block-compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of signed normalized RG texel data with the first 64 bits encoding red values followed by 64 bits encoding green values.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC5_SNORM_BLOCK 指定一种两部分，块压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩纹理像素编码一个带符号的归一化RG texel数据的4×4矩形，前64位编码红色值，然后64位编码绿色值。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC5_UNORM_BLOCK specifies a two-component, block-compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RG texel data with the first 64 bits encoding red values followed by 64 bits encoding green values.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC5_UNORM_BLOCK 指定一种两部分，块压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩纹理像素编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RG纹理数据，前64位编码红色值，然后64位编码绿色值。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC6H_SFLOAT_BLOCK specifies a three-component, block-compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of signed floating-point RGB texel data.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC6H_SFLOAT_BLOCK 指定一种三分量，块压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩纹理像素块对一个4×4矩形的带符号浮点RGB纹理像素数据进行编码。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC6H_UFLOAT_BLOCK specifies a three-component, block-compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned floating-point RGB texel data.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC6H_UFLOAT_BLOCK 指定一种三分量，块压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩纹理像素块编码一个4×4矩形的无符号浮点RGB纹理像素数据。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC7_SRGB_BLOCK specifies a four-component, block-compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGBA texel data with sRGB nonlinear encoding applied to the RGB components.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC7_SRGB_BLOCK 指定一种四分量，块压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩纹理像素编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGBA纹理数据，并将sRGB非线性编码应用于RGB分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_BC7_UNORM_BLOCK specifies a four-component, block-compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGBA texel data.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_BC7_UNORM_BLOCK 指定一种四部分，块压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩纹理像素编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGBA纹理数据。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_D16_UNORM specifies a one-component, 16-bit unsigned normalized format that has a single 16-bit depth component.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_D16_UNORM 指定具有一个16位深度分量的单分量16位无符号归一化格式。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_D16_UNORM_S8_UINT specifies a two-component, 24-bit format that has 16 unsigned normalized bits in the depth component and 8 unsigned integer bits in the stencil component.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_D16_UNORM_S8_UINT 指定一个双分量的24位格式，该格式在深度分量中具有16个无符号归一化位，在模板分量中具有8个无符号整数位。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_D24_UNORM_S8_UINT specifies a two-component, 32-bit packed format that has 8 unsigned integer bits in the stencil component, and 24 unsigned normalized bits in the depth component.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_D24_UNORM_S8_UINT 指定一个两成分的32位压缩格式，该格式在模板成分中具有8个无符号整数位，在深度成分中具有24个无符号归一化位。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_D32_SFLOAT specifies a one-component, 32-bit signed floating-point format that has 32-bits in the depth component.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_D32_SFLOAT 指定深度为32位的单分量带符号浮点格式。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_D32_SFLOAT_S8_UINT specifies a two-component format that has 32 signed float bits in the depth component and 8 unsigned integer bits in the stencil component. There are optionally: 24-bits that are unused.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_D32_SFLOAT_S8_UINT 指定一种二分量格式，该二分量格式在深度分量中具有32个带符号的浮点位，在模板分量中具有8个无符号的整数位。可选地：未使用的24位。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_E5B9G9R9_UFLOAT_PACK32 specifies a three-component, 32-bit packed unsigned floating-point format that has a 5-bit shared exponent in bits 27..31, a 9-bit B component mantissa in bits 18..26, a 9-bit G component mantissa in bits 9..17, and a 9-bit R component mantissa in bits 0..8.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_E5B9G9R9_UFLOAT_PACK32 指定三分量，32位打包的无符号浮点格式，其第27..31位具有5位共享指数，第18..26位具有9位B分量尾数，而9位G分量尾数在第9..17位，而9位R分量尾在第0..8位。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_EAC_R11G11_SNORM_BLOCK specifies a two-component, ETC2 compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of signed normalized RG texel data with the first 64 bits encoding red values followed by 64 bits encoding green values.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_EAC_R11G11_SNORM_BLOCK 指定一个两分量ETC2压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩纹理像素编码一个4×4矩形的有符号归一化RG texel数据，前64位编码红色值，然后64位编码绿色值。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_EAC_R11G11_UNORM_BLOCK specifies a two-component, ETC2 compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RG texel data with the first 64 bits encoding red values followed by 64 bits encoding green values.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_EAC_R11G11_UNORM_BLOCK 指定一个两分量ETC2压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩纹理像素编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RG texel数据，前64位编码红色值，然后64位编码绿色值。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_EAC_R11_SNORM_BLOCK specifies a one-component, ETC2 compressed format where each 64-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of signed normalized red texel data.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_EAC_R11_SNORM_BLOCK 指定一种单分量ETC2压缩格式，其中每个64位压缩纹理像素块编码一个带符号的归一化红色纹理像素数据的4×4矩形。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_EAC_R11_UNORM_BLOCK specifies a one-component, ETC2 compressed format where each 64-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized red texel data.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_EAC_R11_UNORM_BLOCK 指定一种单分量ETC2压缩格式，其中每个64位压缩纹理像素编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化红色纹理数据。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8A1_SRGB_BLOCK specifies a four-component, ETC2 compressed format where each 64-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGB texel data with sRGB nonlinear encoding, and provides 1 bit of alpha.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8A1_SRGB_BLOCK 指定一种四分量ETC2压缩格式，其中每个64位压缩texel块使用sRGB非线性编码对4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGB texel数据进行编码，并提供1位alpha。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8A1_UNORM_BLOCK specifies a four-component, ETC2 compressed format where each 64-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGB texel data, and provides 1 bit of alpha.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8A1_UNORM_BLOCK 指定一种四分量ETC2压缩格式，其中每个64位压缩纹理像素编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGB纹理像素数据，并提供1位alpha。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8A8_SRGB_BLOCK specifies a four-component, ETC2 compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGBA texel data with the first 64 bits encoding alpha values followed by 64 bits encoding RGB values with sRGB nonlinear encoding applied.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8A8_SRGB_BLOCK 指定一种四分量ETC2压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩纹理像素编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGBA纹理数据，前64位编码alpha值，然后64位编码RGB值并应用sRGB非线性编码。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8A8_UNORM_BLOCK specifies a four-component, ETC2 compressed format where each 128-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGBA texel data with the first 64 bits encoding alpha values followed by 64 bits encoding RGB values.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8A8_UNORM_BLOCK 指定一种四分量ETC2压缩格式，其中每个128位压缩纹理像素编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGBA纹理数据，其中前64位编码alpha值，然后64位编码RGB值。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8_SRGB_BLOCK specifies a three-component, ETC2 compressed format where each 64-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGB texel data with sRGB nonlinear encoding. This format has no alpha and is considered opaque.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8_SRGB_BLOCK 指定一种三分量ETC2压缩格式，其中每个64位压缩纹理像素块使用sRGB非线性编码对一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGB纹理像素数据进行编码。此格式没有Alpha，并且被认为是不透明的。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8_UNORM_BLOCK specifies a three-component, ETC2 compressed format where each 64-bit compressed texel block encodes a 4×4 rectangle of unsigned normalized RGB texel data. This format has no alpha and is considered opaque.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_ETC2_R8G8B8_UNORM_BLOCK 指定一种三分量ETC2压缩格式，其中每个64位压缩纹理像素块编码一个4×4矩形的无符号归一化RGB纹理像素数据。此格式没有Alpha，并且被认为是不透明的。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_DST_BIT specifies that an image can be used as dstImage for the vkCmdBlitImage command.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_DST_BIT 指定对图像可以被用作 dstImage 为 vkCmdBlitImage 命令。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT specifies that an image can be used as srcImage for the vkCmdBlitImage command.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT 指定对图像可以被用作 srcImage 为 vkCmdBlitImage 命令。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT specifies that an image view can be used as a framebuffer color attachment and as an input attachment.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT 指定对图像视图可以被用作帧缓冲器颜色附件和作为输入附件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BLEND_BIT specifies that an image view can be used as a framebuffer color attachment that supports blending and as an input attachment.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BLEND_BIT 指定图像视图可以用作支持混合的帧缓冲区颜色附件和输入附件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT specifies that an image view can be used as a framebuffer depth/stencil attachment and as an input attachment.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT 指定对图像视图可以被用作帧缓冲器的深度/模板附接和作为输入附件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT specifies that an image view can be sampled from.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT 指定可以从中采样图像视图。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_LINEAR_BIT specifies that if VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT is also set, an image view can be used with a sampler that has either of magFilter or minFilter set to VK_FILTER_LINEAR, or mipmapMode set to VK_SAMPLER_MIPMAP_MODE_LINEAR. If VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT is also set, an image can be used as the srcImage to vkCmdBlitImage with a filter of VK_FILTER_LINEAR. This bit must only be exposed for formats that also support the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT or VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_LINEAR_BIT 指定如果 VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT 也被设置，图像视图可以被与具有任一的取样中使用 magFilter 或 minFilter 集到 VK_FILTER_LINEAR ，或 mipmapMode 设置为 VK_SAMPLER_MIPMAP_MODE_LINEAR 。如果 VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT 也被设置，图像可以被用作 srcImage 到vkCmdBlitImage与 filter 的 VK_FILTER_LINEAR 。该位必须只能暴露格式，还支持 VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT 或 VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT 。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_IMAGE_ATOMIC_BIT specifies that an image view can be used as storage image that supports atomic operations.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_IMAGE_ATOMIC_BIT 指定对图像视图可以被用作支持原子操作存储图像。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_IMAGE_BIT specifies that an image view can be used as a storage images.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_IMAGE_BIT 指定的图像视图可以被用作存储图像。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER_ATOMIC_BIT specifies that atomic operations are supported on VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER with this format.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER_ATOMIC_BIT 指定以这种格式在 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER 上支持原子操作。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER_BIT specifies that the format can be used to create a buffer view that can be bound to a VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER descriptor.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER_BIT 指定该格式可用于创建可以绑定到 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER 描述符的缓冲区视图。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_UNIFORM_TEXEL_BUFFER_BIT specifies that the format can be used to create a buffer view that can be bound to a VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_TEXEL_BUFFER descriptor.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_UNIFORM_TEXEL_BUFFER_BIT 指定该格式可用于创建可以绑定到 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_TEXEL_BUFFER 描述符的缓冲区视图。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_VERTEX_BUFFER_BIT specifies that the format can be used as a vertex attribute format (VkVertexInputAttributeDescription::format).
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_VERTEX_BUFFER_BIT 指定该格式可以用作顶点属性格式（ VkVertexInputAttributeDescription :: format ）。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R16G16B16A16_SFLOAT specifies a four-component, 64-bit signed floating-point format that has a 16-bit R component in bytes 0..1, a 16-bit G component in bytes 2..3, a 16-bit B component in bytes 4..5, and a 16-bit A component in bytes 6..7.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R16G16B16A16_SFLOAT 指定一种四分量，64位带符号浮点格式，该格式在字节0..1中具有16位R分量，在字节2..3中具有16位G分量，而在字节2..3中具有16位B分量。字节4..5，以及字节6..7中的16位A组件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R16G16B16A16_SINT specifies a four-component, 64-bit signed integer format that has a 16-bit R component in bytes 0..1, a 16-bit G component in bytes 2..3, a 16-bit B component in bytes 4..5, and a 16-bit A component in bytes 6..7.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R16G16B16A16_SINT 指定一种四分量，64位带符号整数格式，该格式在字节0..1中具有16位R分量，在字节2..3中具有16位G分量，在字节4中具有16位B分量。 ..5，以及字节6..7中的16位A组件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R16G16B16A16_SNORM specifies a four-component, 64-bit signed normalized format that has a 16-bit R component in bytes 0..1, a 16-bit G component in bytes 2..3, a 16-bit B component in bytes 4..5, and a 16-bit A component in bytes 6..7.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R16G16B16A16_SNORM 指定一种四分量，64位带符号归一化格式，该格式在字节0..1中具有16位R分量，在字节2..3中具有16位G分量，在字节4中具有16位B分量。 ..5，以及字节6..7中的16位A组件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R16G16B16A16_SSCALED specifies a four-component, 64-bit signed scaled integer format that has a 16-bit R component in bytes 0..1, a 16-bit G component in bytes 2..3, a 16-bit B component in bytes 4..5, and a 16-bit A component in bytes 6..7.
