trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_SINT specifies a four-component, 32-bit signed integer format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, an 8-bit B component in byte 2, and an 8-bit A component in byte 3.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_SINT 指定一种四分量的32位带符号整数格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位B分量，并且具有8位字节3中的组件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_SNORM specifies a four-component, 32-bit signed normalized format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, an 8-bit B component in byte 2, and an 8-bit A component in byte 3.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_SNORM 指定一种四分量的32位带符号归一化格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位B分量，并且具有8位字节3中的组件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_SRGB specifies a four-component, 32-bit unsigned normalized format that has an 8-bit R component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in byte 0, an 8-bit G component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in byte 1, an 8-bit B component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in byte 2, and an 8-bit A component in byte 3.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_SRGB 指定一种四分量，32位无符号归一化格式，该格式具有在字节0中以sRGB非线性编码存储的8位R分量，在字节1中以sRGB非线性编码存储的8位G分量，8位B字节2中使用sRGB非线性编码存储的分量，字节3中使用8位A分量存储的分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_SSCALED specifies a four-component, 32-bit signed scaled format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, an 8-bit B component in byte 2, and an 8-bit A component in byte 3.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_SSCALED 指定一种四分量，32位带符号缩放格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位B分量，并且具有8位字节3中的组件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UINT specifies a four-component, 32-bit unsigned integer format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, an 8-bit B component in byte 2, and an 8-bit A component in byte 3.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UINT 指定一种四分量，32位无符号整数格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位B分量，并且具有8位字节3中的组件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM specifies a four-component, 32-bit unsigned normalized format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, an 8-bit B component in byte 2, and an 8-bit A component in byte 3.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_UNORM 指定一种四分量，32位无符号归一化格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位B分量，并且具有8位字节3中的组件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_USCALED specifies a four-component, 32-bit unsigned scaled format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, an 8-bit B component in byte 2, and an 8-bit A component in byte 3.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8A8_USCALED 指定一种四分量，32位无符号缩放格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位B分量，并且具有8位字节3中的组件。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_SINT specifies a three-component, 24-bit signed integer format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, and an 8-bit B component in byte 2.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_SINT 指定三分量，24位带符号整数格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_SNORM specifies a three-component, 24-bit signed normalized format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, and an 8-bit B component in byte 2.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_SNORM 指定三分量，24位带符号归一化格式，在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_SRGB specifies a three-component, 24-bit unsigned normalized format that has an 8-bit R component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in byte 0, an 8-bit G component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in byte 1, and an 8-bit B component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in byte 2.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_SRGB 指定三分量，24位无符号归一化格式，该格式具有在字节0中以sRGB非线性编码存储的8位R分量，在字节1中以sRGB非线性编码存储的8位G分量和8位B分量以sRGB非线性编码存储在字节2中。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_SSCALED specifies a three-component, 24-bit signed scaled format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, and an 8-bit B component in byte 2.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_SSCALED 指定一种三分量，24位带符号缩放格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_UINT specifies a three-component, 24-bit unsigned integer format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, and an 8-bit B component in byte 2.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_UINT 指定一种三分量，24位无符号整数格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_UNORM specifies a three-component, 24-bit unsigned normalized format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, and an 8-bit B component in byte 2.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_UNORM 指定一种三分量，24位无符号归一化格式，在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_USCALED specifies a three-component, 24-bit unsigned scaled format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, an 8-bit G component in byte 1, and an 8-bit B component in byte 2.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8B8_USCALED 指定一种三分量，24位无符号缩放格式，在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量，在字节2中具有8位B分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_SINT specifies a two-component, 16-bit signed integer format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, and an 8-bit G component in byte 1.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_SINT 指定一个由两位组成的16位带符号整数格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_SNORM specifies a two-component, 16-bit signed normalized format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, and an 8-bit G component in byte 1.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_SNORM 指定两个分量的16位带符号归一化格式，在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_SRGB specifies a two-component, 16-bit unsigned normalized format that has an 8-bit R component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in byte 0, and an 8-bit G component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding in byte 1.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_SRGB 指定两个分量的16位无符号归一化格式，该格式具有在字节0中以sRGB非线性编码存储的8位R分量和在字节1中以sRGB非线性编码存储的8位G分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_SSCALED specifies a two-component, 16-bit signed scaled integer format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, and an 8-bit G component in byte 1.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_SSCALED 指定两个分量的16位带符号缩放的整数格式，该格式在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_UINT specifies a two-component, 16-bit unsigned integer format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, and an 8-bit G component in byte 1.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_UINT 指定两个分量的16位无符号整数格式，在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_UNORM specifies a two-component, 16-bit unsigned normalized format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, and an 8-bit G component in byte 1.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_UNORM 指定两个分量的16位无符号归一化格式，在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_USCALED specifies a two-component, 16-bit unsigned scaled integer format that has an 8-bit R component in byte 0, and an 8-bit G component in byte 1.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8G8_USCALED 指定两个分量的16位无符号可缩放整数格式，在字节0中具有8位R分量，在字节1中具有8位G分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8_SINT specifies a one-component, 8-bit signed integer format that has a single 8-bit R component.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8_SINT 指定具有一个8位R分量的单分量8位带符号整数格式。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8_SNORM specifies a one-component, 8-bit signed normalized format that has a single 8-bit R component.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8_SNORM 指定具有一个8位R分量的单分量8位带符号归一化格式。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8_SRGB specifies a one-component, 8-bit unsigned normalized format that has a single 8-bit R component stored with sRGB nonlinear encoding.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8_SRGB 指定一种单分量8位无符号归一化格式，该格式具有一个以sRGB非线性编码存储的单个8位R分量。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8_SSCALED specifies a one-component, 8-bit signed scaled integer format that has a single 8-bit R component.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8_SSCALED 指定具有一个8位R分量的单分量8位带符号缩放整数格式。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8_UINT specifies a one-component, 8-bit unsigned integer format that has a single 8-bit R component.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8_UINT 指定具有一个8位R分量的单分量8位无符号整数格式。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8_UNORM specifies a one-component, 8-bit unsigned normalized format that has a single 8-bit R component.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8_UNORM 指定具有一个8位R分量的单分量8位无符号归一化格式。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_R8_USCALED specifies a one-component, 8-bit unsigned scaled integer format that has a single 8-bit R component.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_R8_USCALED 指定具有一个8位R分量的单分量8位无符号可缩放整数格式。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_S8_UINT specifies a one-component, 8-bit unsigned integer format that has 8-bits in the stencil component.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_S8_UINT 指定一个单组件8位无符号整数格式，该模板组件中具有8位。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED indicates that the format is not specified.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_UNDEFINED 表示未指定格式。

trans-unit.source: VK_FORMAT_X8_D24_UNORM_PACK32 specifies a two-component, 32-bit format that has 24 unsigned normalized bits in the depth component and, optionally:, 8 bits that are unused.
trans-unit.target: VK_FORMAT_X8_D24_UNORM_PACK32 指定一种双分量32位格式，该格式在深度分量中具有24个无符号归一化位，并且可选地：8个未使用的位。

trans-unit.source: VK_FRONT_FACE_CLOCKWISE specifies that a triangle with negative area is considered front-facing.
trans-unit.target: VK_FRONT_FACE_CLOCKWISE 指定具有负面积的三角形被认为是朝前的。

trans-unit.source: VK_FRONT_FACE_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE specifies that a triangle with positive area is considered front-facing.
trans-unit.target: VK_FRONT_FACE_COUNTER_CLOCKWISE 指定具有正面积的三角形被认为是朝前的。

trans-unit.source: VK_HEADER_VERSION is the version number of the vulkan.h header. This value is currently kept synchronized with the release number of the Specification. However, it is not guaranteed to remain synchronized, since most Specification updates have no effect on vulkan.h.
trans-unit.target: VK_HEADER_VERSION 是vulkan.h标头的版本号。该值当前与规范的发行版号保持同步。但是，由于大多数规范更新对vulkan.h均无效，因此不能保证保持同步。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_COLOR_BIT specifies the color aspect.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_COLOR_BIT 指定颜色方面。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_DEPTH_BIT specifies the depth aspect.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_DEPTH_BIT 指定深度方面。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_METADATA_BIT specifies the metadata aspect, used for sparse sparse resource operations.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_METADATA_BIT 指定用于稀疏稀疏资源操作的元数据方面。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_STENCIL_BIT specifies the stencil aspect.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_STENCIL_BIT 指定模具外观。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_CUBE_COMPATIBLE_BIT specifies that the image can be used to create a VkImageView of type VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_CUBE or VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_CUBE_ARRAY.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_CUBE_COMPATIBLE_BIT 指定该图像可以被用来创建一个 VkImageView 类型的 VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_CUBE 或 VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_CUBE_ARRAY 。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_MUTABLE_FORMAT_BIT specifies that the image can be used to create a VkImageView with a different format from the image.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_MUTABLE_FORMAT_BIT 指定可以使用图像来创建具有与图像不同格式的 VkImageView 。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_ALIASED_BIT specifies that the image will be backed using sparse memory binding with memory ranges that might also simultaneously be backing another image (or another portion of the same image). Images created with this flag must also be created with the VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT flag
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_ALIASED_BIT 指定使用稀疏内存绑定和可能同时备份另一个图像（或同一图像的另一部分）的内存范围来备份该图像。用该标志创建的影像必须也可与创建 VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT 标志

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT specifies that the image will be backed using sparse memory binding.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT 指定将使用稀疏内存绑定来备份映像。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT specifies that the image can be partially backed using sparse memory binding. Images created with this flag must also be created with the VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT flag.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT 指定可以使用稀疏内存绑定部分备份映像。用该标志创建的影像必须也可与创建 VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT 标志。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_OPTIMALmust only be used as a color or resolve attachment in a VkFramebuffer. This layout is valid only for image subresources of images created with the VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT usage bit enabled.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_OPTIMAL 必须仅用作颜色或解析 VkFramebuffer 中的附件。此布局仅对启用了 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT 使用位的图像的图像子资源有效。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_OPTIMALmust only be used as a depth/stencil attachment in a VkFramebuffer. This layout is valid only for image subresources of images created with the VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT usage bit enabled.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_OPTIMAL 必须仅被用作在一个深度/模板附着 VkFramebuffer 。此布局仅对启用了 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT 使用位创建的图像的图像子资源有效。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_DEPTH_STENCIL_READ_ONLY_OPTIMALmust only be used as a read-only depth/stencil attachment in a VkFramebuffer and/or as a read-only image in a shader (which can be read as a sampled image, combined image/sampler and/or input attachment). This layout is valid only for image subresources of images created with the VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT usage bit enabled. Only image subresources of images created with VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BITcan be used as a sampled image or combined image/sampler in a shader. Similarly, only image subresources of images created with VK_IMAGE_USAGE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_BITcan be used as input attachments.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_DEPTH_STENCIL_READ_ONLY_OPTIMAL 必须仅被用作一个只读深度/模板附着 VkFramebuffer 和/或作为在着色器的只读图像（其可以被理解为一个采样的图像，合成图像/采样和/或输入附件）。此布局仅对启用了 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT 使用位创建的图像的图像子资源有效。仅使用创建的图像的图像的子资源 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT 可以被用作着色器一个采样图像或合成图像/采样。同样，只有使用 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_BIT 创建的图像的图像子资源可以用作输入附件。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_GENERAL supports all types of device access.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_GENERAL supports all types of device access.

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PREINITIALIZED does not support device access. This layout must only be used as the initialLayout member of VkImageCreateInfo or VkAttachmentDescription, or as the oldLayout in an image transition. When transitioning out of this layout, the contents of the memory are preserved. This layout is intended to be used as the initial layout for an image whose contents are written by the host, and hence the data can be written to memory immediately, without first executing a layout transition. Currently, VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PREINITIALIZED is only useful with VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR images because there is not a standard layout defined for VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL images.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PREINITIALIZED 不支持设备访问。这种布局必须仅被用作 initialLayout 的构件 VkImageCreateInfo 或 VkAttachmentDescription ，或者作为 oldLayout 在图像过渡。从该布局过渡时，将保留存储器的内容。该布局旨在用作其内容由主机写入的图像的初始布局，因此无需首先执行布局转换就可以将数据立即写入内存。目前， VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_PREINITIALIZED 仅对 VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR 有用图像，因为没有为 VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL 图像定义标准布局。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHADER_READ_ONLY_OPTIMALmust only be used as a read-only image in a shader (which can be read as a sampled image, combined image/sampler and/or input attachment). This layout is valid only for image subresources of images created with the VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT or VK_IMAGE_USAGE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_BIT usage bit enabled.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_SHADER_READ_ONLY_OPTIMAL 必须仅用作着色器中的只读图像（可以作为采样图像，组合的图像/采样器和/或输入附件读取）。此布局仅对启用了 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT 或 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_BIT 使用位创建的图像的图像子资源有效。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_TRANSFER_DST_OPTIMALmust only be used as a destination image of a transfer command. This layout is valid only for image subresources of images created with the VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT usage bit enabled.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_TRANSFER_DST_OPTIMAL 必须仅用作传输命令的目标映像。此布局仅对启用了 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT 使用位创建的图像的图像子资源有效。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_TRANSFER_SRC_OPTIMALmust only be used as a source image of a transfer command (see the definition of VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TRANSFER_BIT). This layout is valid only for image subresources of images created with the VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT usage bit enabled.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_TRANSFER_SRC_OPTIMAL 必须仅用作传输命令的源映像（请参阅 VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TRANSFER_BIT 的定义）。此布局仅对启用了 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT 使用位创建的图像的图像子资源有效。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED does not support device access. This layout must only be used as the initialLayout member of VkImageCreateInfo or VkAttachmentDescription, or as the oldLayout in an image transition. When transitioning out of this layout, the contents of the memory are not guaranteed to be preserved.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_UNDEFINED 不支持设备访问。这种布局必须仅被用作 initialLayout 的构件 VkImageCreateInfo 或 VkAttachmentDescription ，或者作为 oldLayout 在图像过渡。从该布局过渡时，不能保证保留存储器的内容。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR specifies linear tiling (texels are laid out in memory in row-major order, possibly with some padding on each row).
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_TILING_LINEAR 指定线性平铺（纹理像素以行优先顺序排列在内存中，可能在每行上都有填充）。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL specifies optimal tiling (texels are laid out in an implementation-dependent arrangement, for more optimal memory access).
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL 指定最佳切片（为实现最佳的内存访问，以实现相关的排列方式排列纹理像素）。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_TYPE_1D specifies a one-dimensional image.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_TYPE_1D 指定一维图像。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D specifies a two-dimensional image.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D 指定一个二维图像。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_TYPE_3D specifies a three-dimensional image.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_TYPE_3D 指定三维图像。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT specifies that the image can be used to create a VkImageView suitable for use as a color or resolve attachment in a VkFramebuffer.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT 指定该图像可以被用来创建一个 VkImageView 适合用作在彩色或解决附着 VkFramebuffer 。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT specifies that the image can be used to create a VkImageView suitable for use as a depth/stencil attachment in a VkFramebuffer.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT 指定该图像可以被用来创建一个 VkImageView 适合用作在深度/模板附着 VkFramebuffer 。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_BIT specifies that the image can be used to create a VkImageView suitable for occupying VkDescriptorSet slot of type VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT; be read from a shader as an input attachment; and be used as an input attachment in a framebuffer.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_BIT 指定该图像可以被用来创建一个 VkImageView 适于占据 VkDescriptorSet 类型的插槽 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT ; 从着色器读取作为输入附件；并用作帧缓冲区中的输入附件。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT specifies that the image can be used to create a VkImageView suitable for occupying a VkDescriptorSet slot either of type VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLED_IMAGE or VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_COMBINED_IMAGE_SAMPLER, and be sampled by a shader.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT 指定该图像可以被用来创建一个 VkImageView 适于占据 VkDescriptorSet 任一类型的缝隙 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLED_IMAGE 或 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_COMBINED_IMAGE_SAMPLER ，以及由着色器进行采样。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT specifies that the image can be used to create a VkImageView suitable for occupying a VkDescriptorSet slot of type VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_IMAGE.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT 指定该图像可以被用来创建一个 VkImageView 适于占据 VkDescriptorSet 类型的插槽 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_IMAGE 。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT specifies that the image can be used as the destination of a transfer command.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT 指定该图像可以被用作传输命令的目的地。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT specifies that the image can be used as the source of a transfer command.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT 指定该图像可以被用作传输命令的源。

trans-unit.source: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSIENT_ATTACHMENT_BIT specifies that the memory bound to this image will have been allocated with the VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_LAZILY_ALLOCATED_BIT (see html/vkspec.html#memory for more detail). This bit can be set for any image that can be used to create a VkImageView suitable for use as a color, resolve, depth/stencil, or input attachment.
trans-unit.target: VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSIENT_ATTACHMENT_BIT 指定绑定到该映像的内存将已使用 VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_LAZILY_ALLOCATED_BIT 分配（有关更多详细信息，请参阅html / vkspec.html＃memory）。该位可以用于任何图像被设置可以被用来创建一个 VkImageView 适合用作颜色，决心，深度/模板，或输入附件。

trans-unit.source: VK_INCOMPLETE A return array was too small for the result
trans-unit.target: VK_INCOMPLETE 返回数组对于结果而言太小

trans-unit.source: VK_INDEX_TYPE_UINT16 specifies that indices are 16-bit unsigned integer values.
trans-unit.target: VK_INDEX_TYPE_UINT16 指定索引是16位无符号整数值。

trans-unit.source: VK_INDEX_TYPE_UINT32 specifies that indices are 32-bit unsigned integer values.
trans-unit.target: VK_INDEX_TYPE_UINT32 指定索引是32位无符号整数值。

trans-unit.source: VK_INTERNAL_ALLOCATION_TYPE_EXECUTABLE specifies that the allocation is intended for execution by the host.
trans-unit.target: VK_INTERNAL_ALLOCATION_TYPE_EXECUTABLE 指定分配是由主机执行的。

trans-unit.source: VK_MAKE_VERSION constructs an API version number.
trans-unit.target: VK_MAKE_VERSION 构造一个API版本号。

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_HEAP_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT indicates that the heap corresponds to device local memory. Device local memory may have different performance characteristics than host local memory, and may support different memory property flags.
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_HEAP_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT 指示堆对应于设备本地内存。设备本地内存可能具有与主机本地内存不同的性能特征，并且可能支持不同的内存属性标志。

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT bit indicates that memory allocated with this type is the most efficient for device access. This property will only be set for memory types belonging to heaps with the VK_MEMORY_HEAP_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT set.
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT 位指示以这种类型分配的内存对于设备访问而言是最有效的。仅为属于设置了 VK_MEMORY_HEAP_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT 的堆的内存类型设置此属性。

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_CACHED_BIT
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_CACHED_BIT

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_CACHED_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_COHERENT_BIT
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_CACHED_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_COHERENT_BIT

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_COHERENT_BIT
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_COHERENT_BIT

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_LAZILY_ALLOCATED_BIT
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_LAZILY_ALLOCATED_BIT

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_CACHED_BIT bit indicates that memory allocated with this type is cached on the host. Host memory accesses to uncached memory are slower than to cached memory, however uncached memory is always host coherent.
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_CACHED_BIT 位指示在主机上缓存了用这种类型分配的内存。主机内存对未缓存内存的访问要比对缓存内存的访问慢，但是未缓存内存始终是主机一致的。

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_COHERENT_BIT bit indicates that the host cache management commands vkFlushMappedMemoryRanges and vkInvalidateMappedMemoryRanges are not needed to flush host writes to the device or make device writes visible to the host, respectively.
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_COHERENT_BIT 位指示分别不需要刷新主机写入设备或使设备写入对主机可见的主机缓存管理命令vkFlushMappedMemoryRanges和vkInvalidateMappedMemoryRanges。

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT bit indicates that memory allocated with this type can be mapped for host access using vkMapMemory.
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT 位指示可以使用vkMapMemory映射分配给该类型的内存以供主机访问。

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_CACHED_BIT
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_CACHED_BIT

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_CACHED_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_COHERENT_BIT
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_CACHED_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_COHERENT_BIT

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_COHERENT_BIT
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT | VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_COHERENT_BIT

trans-unit.source: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_LAZILY_ALLOCATED_BIT bit indicates that the memory type only allows device access to the memory. Memory types must not have both VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_LAZILY_ALLOCATED_BIT and VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT set. Additionally, the object’s backing memory may be provided by the implementation lazily as specified in Lazily Allocated Memory.
trans-unit.target: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_LAZILY_ALLOCATED_BIT 位指示内存类型仅允许设备访问内存。内存类型必须不可兼得 VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_LAZILY_ALLOCATED_BIT 和 VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_VISIBLE_BIT 集。另外，对象的支持内存可以由实现延迟提供，如延迟分配内存中所指定。

trans-unit.source: VK_NOT_READY A fence or query has not yet completed
trans-unit.target: VK_NOT_READY 篱笆或查询尚未完成

trans-unit.source: VK_NULL_HANDLE is a reserved value representing a non-valid object handle. It may be passed to and returned from Vulkan commands only when specifically allowed.
trans-unit.target: VK_NULL_HANDLE 是表示无效对象句柄的保留值。仅在明确允许的情况下，才可以将其传递到Vulkan命令并从中返回。

trans-unit.source: VK_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_TYPE_CPU - the device is typically running on the same processors as the host.
trans-unit.target: VK_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_TYPE_CPU -设备通常与主机在同一处理器上运行。

trans-unit.source: VK_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_TYPE_DISCRETE_GPU - the device is typically a separate processor connected to the host via an interlink.
trans-unit.target: VK_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_TYPE_DISCRETE_GPU -该设备通常是通过互连链接连接到主机的独立处理器。

trans-unit.source: VK_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_TYPE_INTEGRATED_GPU - the device is typically one embedded in or tightly coupled with the host.
trans-unit.target: VK_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_TYPE_INTEGRATED_GPU -该设备通常是一个嵌入在主机中或与主机紧密耦合的设备。

trans-unit.source: VK_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_TYPE_OTHER - the device does not match any other available types.
trans-unit.target: VK_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_TYPE_OTHER -设备与任何其他可用类型都不匹配。

trans-unit.source: VK_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_TYPE_VIRTUAL_GPU - the device is typically a virtual node in a virtualization environment.
trans-unit.target: VK_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_TYPE_VIRTUAL_GPU -设备通常是虚拟化环境中的虚拟节点。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_COMPUTE specifies binding as a compute pipeline.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_COMPUTE 将绑定指定为计算管道。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_GRAPHICS specifies binding as a graphics pipeline.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_GRAPHICS 将绑定指定为图形管道。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_CACHE_HEADER_VERSION_ONE specifies version one of the pipeline cache.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_CACHE_HEADER_VERSION_ONE 指定管道缓存的版本一。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_CREATE_ALLOW_DERIVATIVES_BIT specifies that the pipeline to be created is allowed to be the parent of a pipeline that will be created in a subsequent call to vkCreateGraphicsPipelines or vkCreateComputePipelines.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_CREATE_ALLOW_DERIVATIVES_BIT 指定允许创建的管道成为在后续调用vkCreateGraphicsPipelines或vkCreateComputePipelines中创建的管道的父管道。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_CREATE_DERIVATIVE_BIT specifies that the pipeline to be created will be a child of a previously created parent pipeline.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_CREATE_DERIVATIVE_BIT 指定要创建的管道将是先前创建的父管道的子管道。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_CREATE_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATION_BIT specifies that the created pipeline will not be optimized. Using this flag may reduce the time taken to create the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_CREATE_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATION_BIT 指定将不优化创建的管道。使用此标志可以减少创建管道所花费的时间。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_ALL_COMMANDS_BIT is equivalent to the logical OR of every other pipeline stage flag that is supported on the queue it is used with.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_ALL_COMMANDS_BIT 等效于与其一起使用的队列上支持的所有其他管道阶段标志的逻辑或。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_ALL_GRAPHICS_BIT specifies the execution of all graphics pipeline stages, and is equivalent to the logical OR of:
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_ALL_GRAPHICS_BIT 指定所有图形管线阶段的执行，并且等效于：

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_BOTTOM_OF_PIPE_BIT and VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TOP_OF_PIPE_BIT are useful for accomplishing layout transitions and queue ownership operations when the required execution dependency is satisfied by other means - for example, semaphore operations between queues.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_BOTTOM_OF_PIPE_BIT 和 VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TOP_OF_PIPE_BIT 在通过其他方式（例如，队列之间的信号量操作）满足所需的执行依赖性时，可用于完成布局转换和队列所有权操作。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_BOTTOM_OF_PIPE_BIT specifies the final stage in the pipeline where operations generated by all commands complete execution.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_BOTTOM_OF_PIPE_BIT 指定管道中由所有命令生成的操作完成执行的最后阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_OUTPUT_BIT specifies the stage of the pipeline after blending where the final color values are output from the pipeline. This stage also includes subpass load and store operations and multisample resolve operations for framebuffer attachments with a color format.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_OUTPUT_BIT 指定混合后管道的阶段，从管道输出最终颜色值。此阶段还包括子通道加载和存储操作以及具有彩色格式的帧缓冲区附件的多样本解析操作。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_COMPUTE_SHADER_BIT specifies the execution of a compute shader.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_COMPUTE_SHADER_BIT 指定执行计算着色器。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_DRAW_INDIRECT_BIT specifies the stage of the pipeline where Draw/DispatchIndirect data structures are consumed.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_DRAW_INDIRECT_BIT 指定使用Draw / DispatchIndirect数据结构的管道阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_EARLY_FRAGMENT_TESTS_BIT specifies the stage of the pipeline where early fragment tests (depth and stencil tests before fragment shading) are performed. This stage also includes subpass load operations for framebuffer attachments with a depth/stencil format.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_EARLY_FRAGMENT_TESTS_BIT 指定执行早期片段测试（片段着色之前的深度和模板测试）的管道阶段。此阶段还包括针对具有深度/模板格式的帧缓冲区附件的子传递加载操作。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_EARLY_FRAGMENT_TESTS_BIT, or VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_LATE_FRAGMENT_TESTS_BIT
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_EARLY_FRAGMENT_TESTS_BIT 或 VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_LATE_FRAGMENT_TESTS_BIT

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_FRAGMENT_SHADER_BIT specifies the fragment shader stage.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_FRAGMENT_SHADER_BIT 指定片段着色器阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_GEOMETRY_SHADER_BIT specifies the geometry shader stage.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_GEOMETRY_SHADER_BIT 指定几何着色器阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_HOST_BIT specifies a pseudo-stage indicating execution on the host of reads/writes of device memory. This stage is not invoked by any commands recorded in a command buffer.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_HOST_BIT 指定一个伪阶段，指示在主机上执行设备内存的读/写操作。记录在命令缓冲区中的任何命令都不会调用此阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_LATE_FRAGMENT_TESTS_BIT specifies the stage of the pipeline where late fragment tests (depth and stencil tests after fragment shading) are performed. This stage also includes subpass store operations for framebuffer attachments with a depth/stencil format.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_LATE_FRAGMENT_TESTS_BIT 指定执行后期片段测试（片段着色后的深度和模板测试）的管道阶段。此阶段还包括针对具有深度/模板格式的帧缓冲区附件的子通道存储操作。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_SHADER_BIT specifies the tessellation control shader stage.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_SHADER_BIT 指定镶嵌控制着色器阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_SHADER_BIT specifies the tessellation evaluation shader stage.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_SHADER_BIT 指定镶嵌评估着色器阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TOP_OF_PIPE_BIT specifies the stage of the pipeline where any commands are initially received by the queue.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TOP_OF_PIPE_BIT 指定队列最初在其中接收任何命令的管道阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TRANSFER_BIT specifies the execution of copy commands. This includes the operations resulting from all copy commands, clear commands (with the exception of vkCmdClearAttachments), and vkCmdCopyQueryPoolResults.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TRANSFER_BIT 指定复制命令的执行。这包括所有复制命令，清除命令（vkCmdClearAttachments除外）和vkCmdCopyQueryPoolResults产生的操作。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_VERTEX_INPUT_BIT specifies the stage of the pipeline where vertex and index buffers are consumed.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_VERTEX_INPUT_BIT 指定消耗顶点和索引缓冲区的流水线阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_VERTEX_SHADER_BIT specifies the vertex shader stage.
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_VERTEX_SHADER_BIT 指定顶点着色器阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_VERTEX_SHADER_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_SHADER_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_SHADER_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_GEOMETRY_SHADER_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_FRAGMENT_SHADER_BIT, or VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_COMPUTE_SHADER_BIT
trans-unit.target: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_VERTEX_SHADER_BIT ， VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_SHADER_BIT ， VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_SHADER_BIT ， VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_GEOMETRY_SHADER_BIT ， VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_FRAGMENT_SHADER_BIT ，或 VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_COMPUTE_SHADER_BIT

trans-unit.source: VK_POLYGON_MODE_FILL specifies that polygons are rendered using the polygon rasterization rules in this section.
trans-unit.target: VK_POLYGON_MODE_FILL 指定使用本节中的多边形栅格化规则来渲染多边形。

trans-unit.source: VK_POLYGON_MODE_LINE specifies that polygon edges are drawn as line segments.
trans-unit.target: VK_POLYGON_MODE_LINE 指定将多边形边缘绘制为线段。

trans-unit.source: VK_POLYGON_MODE_POINT specifies that polygon vertices are drawn as points.
trans-unit.target: VK_POLYGON_MODE_POINT 指定将多边形顶点绘制为点。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_CONTROL_PRECISE_BIT specifies the precision of occlusion queries.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_CONTROL_PRECISE_BIT 指定遮挡查询的精度。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_CLIPPING_INVOCATIONS_BIT specifies that queries managed by the pool will count the number of primitives processed by the Primitive Clipping stage of the pipeline. The counter’s value is incremented each time a primitive reaches the primitive clipping stage.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_CLIPPING_INVOCATIONS_BIT 指定由池管理的查询将对管道的“ 原始裁剪”阶段处理的原语数量进行计数。每当原始图元到达原始裁剪阶段时，计数器的值就会增加。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_CLIPPING_PRIMITIVES_BIT specifies that queries managed by the pool will count the number of primitives output by the Primitive Clipping stage of the pipeline. The counter’s value is incremented each time a primitive passes the primitive clipping stage. The actual number of primitives output by the primitive clipping stage for a particular input primitive is implementation-dependent but must satisfy the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_CLIPPING_PRIMITIVES_BIT 指定由池管理的查询将对管道的“ 原始裁剪”阶段输出的原始数量进行计数。每当图元通过图元限幅阶段时，计数器的值都会增加。对于特定的输入基元，基元裁剪阶段输出的基元的实际数量取决于实现，但必须满足以下条件：

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_COMPUTE_SHADER_INVOCATIONS_BIT specifies that queries managed by the pool will count the number of compute shader invocations. The counter’s value is incremented every time the compute shader is invoked. Implementations may skip the execution of certain compute shader invocations or execute additional compute shader invocations for implementation-dependent reasons as long as the results of rendering otherwise remain unchanged.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_COMPUTE_SHADER_INVOCATIONS_BIT 指定由池管理的查询将计算计算着色器调用的次数。每次调用计算着色器时，计数器的值都会增加。实现可能会跳过某些计算着色器调用的执行，或者出于实现相关的原因而执行其他计算着色器调用，只要渲染结果保持不变即可。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_FRAGMENT_SHADER_INVOCATIONS_BIT specifies that queries managed by the pool will count the number of fragment shader invocations. The counter’s value is incremented each time the fragment shader is invoked.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_FRAGMENT_SHADER_INVOCATIONS_BIT 指定由池管理的查询将计算片段着色器调用的数量。每次调用片段着色器时，计数器的值都会增加。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_GEOMETRY_SHADER_INVOCATIONS_BIT specifies that queries managed by the pool will count the number of geometry shader invocations. This counter’s value is incremented each time a geometry shader is invoked. In the case of instanced geometry shaders, the geometry shader invocations count is incremented for each separate instanced invocation.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_GEOMETRY_SHADER_INVOCATIONS_BIT 指定由池管理的查询将计算几何着色器调用的数量。每次调用几何着色器时，此计数器的值都会增加。对于实例化几何着色器，对于每个单独的实例化调用，几何着色器调用计数都会增加。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_GEOMETRY_SHADER_PRIMITIVES_BIT specifies that queries managed by the pool will count the number of primitives generated by geometry shader invocations. The counter’s value is incremented each time the geometry shader emits a primitive. Restarting primitive topology using the SPIR-V instructions OpEndPrimitive or OpEndStreamPrimitive has no effect on the geometry shader output primitives count.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_GEOMETRY_SHADER_PRIMITIVES_BIT 指定由池管理的查询将计算由几何着色器调用生成的图元数量。每次几何着色器发出图元时，计数器的值都会增加。使用SPIR-V指令 OpEndPrimitive 或 OpEndStreamPrimitive 重新启动图元拓扑不会影响几何着色器输出图元的数量。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_INPUT_ASSEMBLY_PRIMITIVES_BIT specifies that queries managed by the pool will count the number of primitives processed by the input assembly stage. If primitive restart is enabled, restarting the primitive topology has no effect on the count. Incomplete primitives may be counted.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_INPUT_ASSEMBLY_PRIMITIVES_BIT 指定由池管理的查询将对输入组装阶段处理的原语数量进行计数。如果启用了原始重启，则重启原始拓扑不会影响计数。可能会计算不完整的原语。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_INPUT_ASSEMBLY_VERTICES_BIT specifies that queries managed by the pool will count the number of vertices processed by the input assembly stage. Vertices corresponding to incomplete primitives may contribute to the count.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_INPUT_ASSEMBLY_VERTICES_BIT 指定由池管理的查询将计算由输入装配阶段处理的顶点数量。对应于不完整基元的顶点可能会增加计数。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_SHADER_PATCHES_BIT specifies that queries managed by the pool will count the number of patches processed by the tessellation control shader. The counter’s value is incremented once for each patch for which a tessellation control shader is invoked.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_SHADER_PATCHES_BIT 指定由池管理的查询将对镶嵌控制着色器处理的补丁数量进行计数。对于每个调用细分控制着色器的面片，计数器的值增加一次。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_SHADER_INVOCATIONS_BIT specifies that queries managed by the pool will count the number of invocations of the tessellation evaluation shader. The counter’s value is incremented each time the tessellation evaluation shader is invoked.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_SHADER_INVOCATIONS_BIT 指定由池管理的查询将对镶嵌评估着色器的调用次数进行计数。每次调用细分评估着色器时，计数器的值都会增加。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_VERTEX_SHADER_INVOCATIONS_BIT specifies that queries managed by the pool will count the number of vertex shader invocations. This counter’s value is incremented each time a vertex shader is invoked.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_PIPELINE_STATISTIC_VERTEX_SHADER_INVOCATIONS_BIT 指定由池管理的查询将计算顶点着色器调用的数量。每次调用顶点着色器时，此计数器的值都会增加。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_RESULT_64_BIT specifies the results will be written as an array of 64-bit unsigned integer values. If this bit is not set, the results will be written as an array of 32-bit unsigned integer values.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_RESULT_64_BIT 指定结果将被写入为64位无符号整数值的数组。如果未设置此位，则结果将被写入32位无符号整数值的数组。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_RESULT_PARTIAL_BIT specifies that returning partial results is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_RESULT_PARTIAL_BIT 指定返回部分结果是可接受的。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_RESULT_PARTIAL_BITmust not be used if the pool’s queryType is VK_QUERY_TYPE_TIMESTAMP.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_RESULT_PARTIAL_BIT 必须在池的不使用 queryType 是 VK_QUERY_TYPE_TIMESTAMP 。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_RESULT_WAIT_BIT specifies that Vulkan will wait for each query’s status to become available before retrieving its results.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_RESULT_WAIT_BIT 指定Vulkan将在检索其结果之前等待每个查询的状态变为可用。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_RESULT_WITH_AVAILABILITY_BIT specifies that the availability status accompanies the results.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_RESULT_WITH_AVAILABILITY_BIT 指定可用性状态与结果一起显示。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_TYPE_OCCLUSION specifies an occlusion query.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_TYPE_OCCLUSION 指定遮挡查询。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_TYPE_PIPELINE_STATISTICS specifies a pipeline statistics query.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_TYPE_PIPELINE_STATISTICS 指定管道统计信息查询。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUERY_TYPE_TIMESTAMP specifies a timestamp query.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUERY_TYPE_TIMESTAMP 指定一个时间戳查询。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUEUE_COMPUTE_BIT indicates that queues in this queue family support compute operations.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUEUE_COMPUTE_BIT 指示此队列系列中的队列支持计算操作。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUEUE_GRAPHICS_BIT indicates that queues in this queue family support graphics operations.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUEUE_GRAPHICS_BIT 指示此队列系列中的队列支持图形操作。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUEUE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT indicates that queues in this queue family support sparse memory management operations (see Sparse Resources). If any of the sparse resource features are enabled, then at least one queue family must support this bit.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUEUE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT 指示此队列系列中的队列支持稀疏内存管理操作（请参阅稀疏资源）。如果启用了任何稀疏资源功能，则至少一个队列族必须支持此位。

trans-unit.source: VK_QUEUE_TRANSFER_BIT indicates that queues in this queue family support transfer operations.
trans-unit.target: VK_QUEUE_TRANSFER_BIT 指示此队列系列中的队列支持传输操作。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP_TO_BORDER specifies that the clamp to border wrap mode will be used.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP_TO_BORDER 指定将使用钳位到边框环绕模式。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP_TO_EDGE specifies that the clamp to edge wrap mode will be used.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP_TO_EDGE 指定将使用钳位到边缘环绕模式。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_MIRRORED_REPEAT specifies that the mirrored repeat wrap mode will be used.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_MIRRORED_REPEAT 指定将使用镜像重复包装模式。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_MIRROR_CLAMP_TO_EDGE specifies that the mirror clamp to edge wrap mode will be used. This is only valid if the VK_KHR_mirror_clamp_to_edge extension is enabled.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_MIRROR_CLAMP_TO_EDGE 指定将使用镜像钳位到边缘包裹模式。仅在启用了VK_KHR_mirror_clamp_to_edge扩展名时才有效。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_REPEAT specifies that the repeat wrap mode will be used.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_REPEAT 指定将使用重复包装模式。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLER_MIPMAP_MODE_LINEAR specifies linear filtering.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLER_MIPMAP_MODE_LINEAR 指定线性过滤。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLER_MIPMAP_MODE_NEAREST specifies nearest filtering.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLER_MIPMAP_MODE_NEAREST 指定最近的过滤。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_16_BIT specifies an image with 16 samples per pixel.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_16_BIT 指定每像素16个样本的图像。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT specifies an image with one sample per pixel.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT 指定每像素一个样本的图像。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_2_BIT specifies an image with 2 samples per pixel.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_2_BIT 指定每像素2个样本的图像。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_32_BIT specifies an image with 32 samples per pixel.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_32_BIT 指定每像素32个样本的图像。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_4_BIT specifies an image with 4 samples per pixel.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_4_BIT 指定每像素4个样本的图像。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_64_BIT specifies an image with 64 samples per pixel.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_64_BIT 指定每像素64个样本的图像。

trans-unit.source: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_8_BIT specifies an image with 8 samples per pixel.
trans-unit.target: VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_8_BIT 指定每像素8个样本的图像。

trans-unit.source: VK_SHADER_STAGE_ALL is a combination of bits used as shorthand to specify all shader stages supported by the device, including all additional stages which are introduced by extensions.
trans-unit.target: VK_SHADER_STAGE_ALL 是用作简写的位的组合，用于指定设备支持的所有着色器阶段，包括扩展引入的所有其他阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_SHADER_STAGE_ALL_GRAPHICS is a combination of bits used as shorthand to specify all graphics stages defined above (excluding the compute stage).
trans-unit.target: VK_SHADER_STAGE_ALL_GRAPHICS 是用作简写的位的组合，用于指定上面定义的所有图形阶段（计算阶段除外）。

trans-unit.source: VK_SHADER_STAGE_COMPUTE_BIT specifies the compute stage.
trans-unit.target: VK_SHADER_STAGE_COMPUTE_BIT 指定计算阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_SHADER_STAGE_FRAGMENT_BIT specifies the fragment stage.
trans-unit.target: VK_SHADER_STAGE_FRAGMENT_BIT 指定片段阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_SHADER_STAGE_GEOMETRY_BIT specifies the geometry stage.
trans-unit.target: VK_SHADER_STAGE_GEOMETRY_BIT 指定几何阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_SHADER_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_BIT specifies the tessellation control stage.
trans-unit.target: VK_SHADER_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_BIT 指定镶嵌控制阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_SHADER_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_BIT specifies the tessellation evaluation stage.
trans-unit.target: VK_SHADER_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_BIT 指定镶嵌评估阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_SHADER_STAGE_VERTEX_BIT specifies the vertex stage.
trans-unit.target: VK_SHADER_STAGE_VERTEX_BIT 指定顶点阶段。

trans-unit.source: VK_SHARING_MODE_CONCURRENT specifies that concurrent access to any range or image subresource of the object from multiple queue families is supported.
trans-unit.target: VK_SHARING_MODE_CONCURRENT 指定支持从多个队列系列并发访问对象的任何范围或图像子资源。

trans-unit.source: VK_SHARING_MODE_CONCURRENTmay result in lower performance access to the buffer or image than VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE.
trans-unit.target: VK_SHARING_MODE_CONCURRENT 可能导致较低的性能获得比缓冲或图像 VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE 。

trans-unit.source: VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE specifies that access to any range or image subresource of the object will be exclusive to a single queue family at a time.
trans-unit.target: VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE 指定对对象的任何范围或图像子资源的访问将一次只对单个队列系列独占。

trans-unit.source: VK_SPARSE_IMAGE_FORMAT_ALIGNED_MIP_SIZE_BIT specifies that the first mip level whose dimensions are not integer multiples of the corresponding dimensions of the sparse image block begins the mip tail region.
trans-unit.target: VK_SPARSE_IMAGE_FORMAT_ALIGNED_MIP_SIZE_BIT 指定尺寸不为稀疏图像块相应尺寸整数倍的第一个mip级别开始于mip尾部区域。

trans-unit.source: VK_SPARSE_IMAGE_FORMAT_NONSTANDARD_BLOCK_SIZE_BIT specifies that the image uses non-standard sparse image block dimensions, and the imageGranularity values do not match the standard sparse image block dimensions for the given pixel format.
trans-unit.target: VK_SPARSE_IMAGE_FORMAT_NONSTANDARD_BLOCK_SIZE_BIT 指定图像使用非标准稀疏图像块尺寸，并且 imageGranularity 值与给定像素格式的标准稀疏图像块尺寸不匹配。

trans-unit.source: VK_SPARSE_IMAGE_FORMAT_SINGLE_MIPTAIL_BIT specifies that the image uses a single mip tail region for all array layers.
trans-unit.target: VK_SPARSE_IMAGE_FORMAT_SINGLE_MIPTAIL_BIT 指定图像对所有阵列层使用单个mip尾部区域。

trans-unit.source: VK_SPARSE_MEMORY_BIND_METADATA_BIT specifies that the memory being bound is only for the metadata aspect.
trans-unit.target: VK_SPARSE_MEMORY_BIND_METADATA_BIT 指定绑定的内存仅用于元数据方面。

trans-unit.source: VK_STENCIL_FACE_BACK_BIT specifies that only the back set of stencil state is updated.
trans-unit.target: VK_STENCIL_FACE_BACK_BIT 指定仅更新后一组模具状态。

trans-unit.source: VK_STENCIL_FACE_FRONT_BIT specifies that only the front set of stencil state is updated.
trans-unit.target: VK_STENCIL_FACE_FRONT_BIT 指定仅更新前一组模板状态。

trans-unit.source: VK_STENCIL_FRONT_AND_BACK is the combination of VK_STENCIL_FACE_FRONT_BIT and VK_STENCIL_FACE_BACK_BIT, and specifies that both sets of stencil state are updated.
trans-unit.target: VK_STENCIL_FRONT_AND_BACK 是 VK_STENCIL_FACE_FRONT_BIT 和 VK_STENCIL_FACE_BACK_BIT 的组合，并指定更新两组模板状态。

trans-unit.source: VK_STENCIL_OP_DECREMENT_AND_CLAMP decrements the current value and clamps to 0.
trans-unit.target: VK_STENCIL_OP_DECREMENT_AND_CLAMP 递减当前值并将其钳位为0。

trans-unit.source: VK_STENCIL_OP_DECREMENT_AND_WRAP decrements the current value and wraps to the maximum possible value when the value would go below 0.
trans-unit.target: VK_STENCIL_OP_DECREMENT_AND_WRAP 递减当前值，并在该值小于0时包装为最大可能值。

trans-unit.source: VK_STENCIL_OP_INCREMENT_AND_CLAMP increments the current value and clamps to the maximum representable unsigned value.
trans-unit.target: VK_STENCIL_OP_INCREMENT_AND_CLAMP 递增当前值，并钳位到可表示的最大无符号值。

trans-unit.source: VK_STENCIL_OP_INCREMENT_AND_WRAP increments the current value and wraps to 0 when the maximum value would have been exceeded.
trans-unit.target: VK_STENCIL_OP_INCREMENT_AND_WRAP 使当前值递增，并在超过最大值时自动换为0。

trans-unit.source: VK_STENCIL_OP_INVERT bitwise-inverts the current value.
trans-unit.target: VK_STENCIL_OP_INVERT 按位反转当前值。

trans-unit.source: VK_STENCIL_OP_KEEP keeps the current value.
trans-unit.target: VK_STENCIL_OP_KEEP 保持当前值。

trans-unit.source: VK_STENCIL_OP_REPLACE sets the value to reference.
trans-unit.target: VK_STENCIL_OP_REPLACE 将该值设置为 reference 。

trans-unit.source: VK_STENCIL_OP_ZERO sets the value to 0.
trans-unit.target: VK_STENCIL_OP_ZERO 将该值设置为0。

trans-unit.source: VK_SUBPASS_CONTENTS_INLINE specifies that the contents of the subpass will be recorded inline in the primary command buffer, and secondary command buffers must not be executed within the subpass.
trans-unit.target: VK_SUBPASS_CONTENTS_INLINE 指定子过程的内容将内联记录在主命令缓冲区中，并且辅助命令缓冲区一定不能在子过程中执行。

trans-unit.source: VK_SUBPASS_CONTENTS_SECONDARY_COMMAND_BUFFERS specifies that the contents are recorded in secondary command buffers that will be called from the primary command buffer, and vkCmdExecuteCommands is the only valid command on the command buffer until vkCmdNextSubpass or vkCmdEndRenderPass.
trans-unit.target: VK_SUBPASS_CONTENTS_SECONDARY_COMMAND_BUFFERS 指定将内容记录在将从主命令缓冲区调用的辅助命令缓冲区中，并且vkCmdExecuteCommands是命令缓冲区上唯一有效的命令，直到vkCmdNextSubpass或vkCmdEndRenderPass为止。

trans-unit.source: VK_SUCCESS Command successfully completed
trans-unit.target: VK_SUCCESS 命令成功完成

trans-unit.source: VK_SYSTEM_ALLOCATION_SCOPE_CACHE specifies that the allocation is scoped to the lifetime of a VkPipelineCache object.
trans-unit.target: VK_SYSTEM_ALLOCATION_SCOPE_CACHE 指定分配范围为 VkPipelineCache 对象的生存期。

trans-unit.source: VK_SYSTEM_ALLOCATION_SCOPE_COMMAND specifies that the allocation is scoped to the duration of the Vulkan command.
trans-unit.target: VK_SYSTEM_ALLOCATION_SCOPE_COMMAND 指定分配范围为Vulkan命令的持续时间。

trans-unit.source: VK_SYSTEM_ALLOCATION_SCOPE_DEVICE specifies that the allocation is scoped to the lifetime of the Vulkan device.
trans-unit.target: VK_SYSTEM_ALLOCATION_SCOPE_DEVICE 指定分配范围为Vulkan设备的生存期。

trans-unit.source: VK_SYSTEM_ALLOCATION_SCOPE_INSTANCE specifies that the allocation is scoped to the lifetime of the Vulkan instance.
trans-unit.target: VK_SYSTEM_ALLOCATION_SCOPE_INSTANCE 指定分配范围为Vulkan实例的生存期。

trans-unit.source: VK_SYSTEM_ALLOCATION_SCOPE_OBJECT specifies that the allocation is scoped to the lifetime of the Vulkan object that is being created or used.
trans-unit.target: VK_SYSTEM_ALLOCATION_SCOPE_OBJECT 指定分配的作用域是所创建或使用的Vulkan对象的生存期。

trans-unit.source: VK_TIMEOUT A wait operation has not completed in the specified time
trans-unit.target: VK_TIMEOUT 在指定的时间内等待操作尚未完成

trans-unit.source: VK_TRUE represents a boolean True (integer 1) value, and VK_FALSE a boolean False (integer 0) value.
trans-unit.target: VK_TRUE 表示布尔值True（整数1），而 VK_FALSE 表示布尔值False（整数0）。

trans-unit.source: VK_VERSION_MAJOR extracts the API major version number from a packed version number:
trans-unit.target: VK_VERSION_MAJOR 从打包的版本号中提取API主版本号：

trans-unit.source: VK_VERSION_MINOR extracts the API minor version number from a packed version number:
trans-unit.target: VK_VERSION_MINOR 从打包版本号中提取API次要版本号：

trans-unit.source: VK_VERSION_PATCH extracts the API patch version number from a packed version number:
trans-unit.target: VK_VERSION_PATCH 从打包的版本号中提取API补丁版本号：

trans-unit.source: VK_VERTEX_INPUT_RATE_INSTANCE specifies that vertex attribute addressing is a function of the instance index.
trans-unit.target: VK_VERTEX_INPUT_RATE_INSTANCE 指定顶点属性寻址是实例索引的函数。

trans-unit.source: VK_VERTEX_INPUT_RATE_VERTEX specifies that vertex attribute addressing is a function of the vertex index.
trans-unit.target: VK_VERTEX_INPUT_RATE_VERTEX 指定顶点属性寻址是顶点索引的函数。

trans-unit.source: VkAccessFlags is a mask of zero or more VkAccessFlagBits. It is used as a member and/or parameter of the structures and commands in the See Also section below.
trans-unit.target: VkAccessFlags 是零个或多个VkAccessFlagBits的掩码。在下面的另请参见部分中，它用作结构和命令的成员和/或参数。

trans-unit.source: VkAttachmentDescriptionFlags is a mask of zero or more VkAttachmentDescriptionFlagBits. It is used as a member and/or parameter of the structures and commands in the See Also section below.
trans-unit.target: VkAttachmentDescriptionFlags 是零个或多个VkAttachmentDescriptionFlagBits的掩码。在下面的另请参见部分中，它用作结构和命令的成员和/或参数。

trans-unit.source: VkBool32 represents boolean True and False values, since C does not have a sufficiently portable built-in boolean type:
trans-unit.target: VkBool32 表示布尔值 True 和 False ，因为C没有足够可移植的内置布尔类型：

trans-unit.source: VkBool32, VkBorderColor, VkCompareOp, VkFilter, VkSamplerAddressMode, VkSamplerCreateFlags, VkSamplerMipmapMode, VkStructureType, vkCreateSampler
trans-unit.target: VkBool32 ，VkBorderColor，VkCompareOp，VkFilter，VkSamplerAddressMode，VkSamplerCreateFlags，VkSamplerMipmapMode，VkStructureType，vkCreateSampler

trans-unit.source: VkBool32, VkCommandBufferBeginInfo, VkFramebuffer, VkQueryControlFlags, VkQueryPipelineStatisticFlags, VkRenderPass, VkStructureType
trans-unit.target: VkBool32 ，VkCommandBufferBeginInfo，VkFramebuffer，VkQueryControlFlags，VkQueryPipelineStatisticFlags，VkRenderPass，VkStructureType

trans-unit.source: VkBool32, VkCompareOp, VkGraphicsPipelineCreateInfo, VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateFlags, VkStencilOpState, VkStructureType
trans-unit.target: VkBool32 ，VkCompareOp，VkGraphicsPipelineCreateInfo，VkPipelineDepthStencilStateCreateFlags，VkStencilOpState，VkStructureType

trans-unit.source: VkBool32, VkCullModeFlags, VkFrontFace, VkGraphicsPipelineCreateInfo, VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateFlags, VkPolygonMode, VkStructureType
trans-unit.target: VkBool32 ，VkCullModeFlags，VkFrontFace，VkGraphicsPipelineCreateInfo，VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateFlags，VkPolygonMode，VkStructureType

trans-unit.source: VkBool32, VkDevice, VkFence
trans-unit.target: VkBool32 ，VkDevice，VkFence

trans-unit.source: VkBool32, VkDeviceCreateInfo, vkGetPhysicalDeviceFeatures
trans-unit.target: VkBool32 ，VkDeviceCreateInfo，vkGetPhysicalDeviceFeatures

trans-unit.source: VkBool32, VkGraphicsPipelineCreateInfo, VkLogicOp, VkPipelineColorBlendAttachmentState, VkPipelineColorBlendStateCreateFlags, VkStructureType

trans-unit.source: amust be a valid VkComponentSwizzle value
trans-unit.target: a 必须是一个有效的VkComponentSwizzle值

trans-unit.source: addressModeU and addressModeVmust each be either VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP_TO_EDGE or VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP_TO_BORDER.
trans-unit.target: addressModeU 和 addressModeV 必须分别为 VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP_TO_EDGE 或 VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_CLAMP_TO_BORDER 。

trans-unit.source: addressModeU is a VkSamplerAddressMode value specifying the addressing mode for outside [0..1] range for U coordinate.
trans-unit.target: addressModeU 是VkSamplerAddressMode值，用于为U坐标指定[0..1]范围之外的寻址模式。

trans-unit.source: addressModeUmust be a valid VkSamplerAddressMode value
trans-unit.target: addressModeU 必须为有效的VkSamplerAddressMode值

trans-unit.source: addressModeV is a VkSamplerAddressMode value specifying the addressing mode for outside [0..1] range for V coordinate.
trans-unit.target: addressModeV 是VkSamplerAddressMode值，用于指定V坐标的[0..1]范围之外的寻址模式。

trans-unit.source: addressModeVmust be a valid VkSamplerAddressMode value
trans-unit.target: addressModeV 必须为有效的VkSamplerAddressMode值

trans-unit.source: addressModeW is a VkSamplerAddressMode value specifying the addressing mode for outside [0..1] range for W coordinate.
trans-unit.target: addressModeW 是VkSamplerAddressMode值，它为W坐标指定[0..1]范围之外的寻址模式。

trans-unit.source: addressModeWmust be a valid VkSamplerAddressMode value
trans-unit.target: addressModeW 必须为有效的VkSamplerAddressMode值

trans-unit.source: alignment is the alignment, in bytes, of the offset within the allocation required for the resource.
trans-unit.target: alignment 是资源所需的分配内的偏移量的对齐方式（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: alignment is the requested alignment of the allocation in bytes and must be a power of two.
trans-unit.target: alignment 是请求的分配对齐方式（以字节为单位），并且必须为2的幂。

trans-unit.source: allocationScope is a VkSystemAllocationScope value specifying the allocation scope of the lifetime of the allocation, as described here.
trans-unit.target: allocationScope 是VkSystemAllocationScope值，指定分配的寿命的分配范围，如所描述这里。

trans-unit.source: allocationSize is the size of the allocation in bytes
trans-unit.target: allocationSize 是分配的大小（以字节为单位）

trans-unit.source: allocationSizemust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: allocationSize 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: allocationSizemust be less than or equal to the amount of memory available to the VkMemoryHeap specified by memoryTypeIndex and the calling command’s VkDevice
trans-unit.target: allocationSize 必须小于或等于可用内存量 VkMemoryHeap 通过指定 memoryTypeIndex 和调用命令的 VkDevice

trans-unit.source: allocationType is a VkInternalAllocationType value specifying the requested type of an allocation.
trans-unit.target: allocationType 是VkInternalAllocationType值，指定的分配的请求的类型。

trans-unit.source: alphaBlendOp selects which blend operation is use to calculate the alpha values to write to the color attachment.
trans-unit.target: alphaBlendOp 选择哪个混合操作用于计算要写入颜色附件的alpha值。

trans-unit.source: alphaBlendOpmust be a valid VkBlendOp value
trans-unit.target: alphaBlendOp 必须是有效的VkBlendOp值

trans-unit.source: alphaToCoverageEnable controls whether a temporary coverage value is generated based on the alpha component of the fragment’s first color output as specified in the Multisample Coverage section.
trans-unit.target: alphaToCoverageEnable 控制是否根据片段的第一个颜色输出的alpha分量（如“ 多样本覆盖率”部分中指定的那样）生成临时覆盖率值。

trans-unit.source: alphaToOne indicates whether the implementation is able to replace the alpha value of the color fragment output from the fragment shader with the maximum representable alpha value for fixed-point colors or 1.0 for floating-point colors. If this feature is not enabled, then the alphaToOneEnable member of the VkPipelineMultisampleStateCreateInfo structure must be set to VK_FALSE. Otherwise setting alphaToOneEnable to VK_TRUE will enable alpha-to-one behavior.
trans-unit.target: alphaToOne 指示实现是否能够使用定点颜色的最大可表示alpha值或浮点颜色的1.0替换从片段着色器输出的颜色片段的alpha值。如果未启用此功能，则必须将 VkPipelineMultisampleStateCreateInfo 结构的 alphaToOneEnable 成员设置为 VK_FALSE 。否则，将 alphaToOneEnable 设置为 VK_TRUE 将启用Alpha-to-One行为。

trans-unit.source: alphaToOneEnable controls whether the alpha component of the fragment’s first color output is replaced with one as described in Multisample Coverage.
trans-unit.target: alphaToOneEnable 控制片段的第一个颜色输出的alpha分量是否被Multisample Coverage中描述的替换。

trans-unit.source: anisotropyEnable is VK_TRUE to enable anisotropic filtering, as described in the Texel Anisotropic Filtering section, or VK_FALSE otherwise.
trans-unit.target: anisotropyEnable 为 VK_TRUE 以启用各向异性过滤，如“ Texel各向异性过滤”部分所述，否则为 VK_FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: anisotropyEnablemust be VK_FALSE.
trans-unit.target: anisotropyEnable 必须为 VK_FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: apiVersion is the version of Vulkan supported by the device, encoded as described in the API Version Numbers and Semantics section.
trans-unit.target: apiVersion 是设备支持的Vulkan版本，其编码方式如“ API版本号和语义”部分所述。

trans-unit.source: apiVersion is the version of the Vulkan API against which the application expects to run, encoded as described in the API Version Numbers and Semantics section. If apiVersion is 0 the implementation must ignore it, otherwise if the implementation does not support the requested apiVersion, or an effective substitute for apiVersion, it must return VK_ERROR_INCOMPATIBLE_DRIVER. The patch version number specified in apiVersion is ignored when creating an instance object. Only the major and minor versions of the instance must match those requested in apiVersion.
trans-unit.target: apiVersion 是应用程序希望针对其运行的Vulkan API的版本，并按照“ API版本号和语义”部分中的说明进行了编码。如果 apiVersion 是0的实施必须忽略它，否则，如果实现不支持请求 apiVersion ，或者有效的替代品 apiVersion ，它必须返回 VK_ERROR_INCOMPATIBLE_DRIVER 。创建实例对象时，会忽略 apiVersion 中指定的补丁程序版本号。只有实例的主要版本和次要版本必须与 apiVersion 中请求的版本匹配。

trans-unit.source: applicationVersion is an unsigned integer variable containing the developer-supplied version number of the application.
trans-unit.target: applicationVersion 是一个无符号整数变量，包含开发人员提供的应用程序版本号。

trans-unit.source: arrayLayer selects the array layer.
trans-unit.target: arrayLayer 选择数组层。

trans-unit.source: arrayLayermust be less than the arrayLayers specified in VkImageCreateInfo when the image was created
trans-unit.target: arrayLayer 创建图像时，arrayLayer 必须小于 arrayLayers 指定的arrayLayers

trans-unit.source: arrayLayers ≥ 1
trans-unit.target: arrayLayers ≥1

trans-unit.source: arrayLayers ≥ 6
trans-unit.target: arrayLayers ≥6

trans-unit.source: arrayLayers ≥ 6 × N
trans-unit.target: arrayLayers ≥6 × N

trans-unit.source: arrayLayers = 1
trans-unit.target: arrayLayers = 1

trans-unit.source: arrayLayers = ci.arrayLayers
trans-unit.target: arrayLayers = ci。 arrayLayers

trans-unit.source: arrayLayers is 1
trans-unit.target: arrayLayers 为1

trans-unit.source: arrayLayers is the number of layers in the image.
trans-unit.target: arrayLayers 是图像中的层数。

trans-unit.source: arrayLayersmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: arrayLayers 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: arrayLayersmust be less than or equal to VkImageFormatProperties::maxArrayLayers (as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties with format, imageType, tiling, usage, and flags equal to those in this structure)
trans-unit.target: arrayLayers 必须小于或等于 VkImageFormatProperties :: maxArrayLayers （由 vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties 返回，其 format ， imageType ， tiling ， usage 和 flags 与该结构中的相等）

trans-unit.source: arrayPitch describes the number of bytes between each array layer of an image.
trans-unit.target: arrayPitch 描述图像的每个数组层之间的字节数。

trans-unit.source: arrayPitch is undefined for images that were not created as arrays. depthPitch is defined only for 3D images.
trans-unit.target: arrayPitch 对于未创建为数组的图像，未定义arrayPitch。 depthPitch 仅为3D图像定义。

trans-unit.source: aspectMask is a VkImageAspectFlags selecting the image aspect.
trans-unit.target: aspectMask 是一个VkImageAspectFlags，它选择图像的长宽比。

trans-unit.source: aspectMask is a bitmask VkImageAspectFlagBits specifying which aspects of the image the properties apply to.
trans-unit.target: aspectMask 是一个位掩码VkImageAspectFlagBits，用于指定属性应用于图像的哪些方面。

trans-unit.source: aspectMask is a bitmask of VkImageAspectFlagBits specifying which aspect(s) of the image are included in the view.
trans-unit.target: aspectMask 是VkImageAspectFlagBits的位掩码，用于指定视图中包含图像的哪些方面。

trans-unit.source: aspectMask is a combination of VkImageAspectFlagBits, selecting the color, depth and/or stencil aspects to be copied.
trans-unit.target: aspectMask 是VkImageAspectFlagBits的组合，用于选择要复制的颜色，深度和/或模板外观。

trans-unit.source: aspectMask is a mask selecting the color, depth and/or stencil aspects of the attachment to be cleared. aspectMaskcan include VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_COLOR_BIT for color attachments, VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_DEPTH_BIT for depth/stencil attachments with a depth component, and VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_STENCIL_BIT for depth/stencil attachments with a stencil component. If the subpass’s depth/stencil attachment is VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED, then the clear has no effect.
trans-unit.target: aspectMask 是一个遮罩，用于选择要清除的附件的颜色，深度和/或模版方面。 aspectMask 可以包括 VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_COLOR_BIT 用于彩色附件， VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_DEPTH_BIT 用于与深度分量深度/模板附件和 VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_STENCIL_BIT 用于与模板组件深度/模板附件。如果子通道的深度/模板附件为 VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED ，则清除无效。

trans-unit.source: aspectMaskmust be a valid combination of VkImageAspectFlagBits values
trans-unit.target: aspectMask 必须是VkImageAspectFlagBits值的有效组合

trans-unit.source: aspectMaskmust be only VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_COLOR_BIT, VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_DEPTH_BIT or VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_STENCIL_BIT if format is a color, depth-only or stencil-only format, respectively. If using a depth/stencil format with both depth and stencil components, aspectMaskmust include at least one of VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_DEPTH_BIT and VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_STENCIL_BIT, and can include both.
trans-unit.target: aspectMask 必须是唯一 VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_COLOR_BIT ， VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_DEPTH_BIT 或 VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_STENCIL_BIT 如果 format 是一个颜色，深度或只模版的格式，分别。如果同时使用深度和模板格式以及深度和模板组件，则 aspectMask 必须至少包含 VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_DEPTH_BIT 和 VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_STENCIL_BIT 之一，并且可以同时包含两者。

trans-unit.source: aspectMaskmust not be 0
trans-unit.target: aspectMask 一定不会 0

trans-unit.source: aspectMaskmust not contain VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_METADATA_BIT
trans-unit.target: aspectMask 必须不包含 VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_METADATA_BIT

trans-unit.source: aspectMaskmust not include VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_METADATA_BIT
trans-unit.target: aspectMask 必须不包括 VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_METADATA_BIT

trans-unit.source: attachment is the index of the attachment of the render pass, and corresponds to the index of the corresponding element in the pAttachments array of the VkRenderPassCreateInfo structure. If any color or depth/stencil attachments are VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED, then no writes occur for those attachments.
trans-unit.target: attachment 是渲染过程的附件的索引，并对应于在相应的元素的索引 pAttachments 所述的阵列 VkRenderPassCreateInfo 结构。如果有任何颜色或深度/模板附件为 VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED ，则不会对这些附件进行写操作。

trans-unit.source: attachmentCount is the number of VkPipelineColorBlendAttachmentState elements in pAttachments. This value must equal the colorAttachmentCount for the subpass in which this pipeline is used.
trans-unit.target: attachmentCount 是 VkPipelineColorBlendAttachmentState 元素的 pAttachments 。该值必须等于使用此管道的子 colorAttachmentCount 的colorAttachmentCount。

trans-unit.source: attachmentCount is the number of attachments used by this render pass, or zero indicating no attachments. Attachments are referred to by zero-based indices in the range [0,attachmentCount).
trans-unit.target: attachmentCount 是此渲染过程使用的附件数，或者为零，表示没有附件。附件由[0， attachmentCount ）范围内从零开始的索引引用。

trans-unit.source: attachmentCount is the number of attachments.
trans-unit.target: attachmentCount 是附件数。

trans-unit.source: attachmentCount is the number of entries in the pAttachments array.
trans-unit.target: attachmentCount 是 pAttachments 数组中的条目数。

trans-unit.source: attachmentCountmust be equal to the attachment count specified in renderPass
trans-unit.target: attachmentCount 必须等于 renderPass 中指定的附件计数

trans-unit.source: attachmentCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: attachmentCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: b is a VkComponentSwizzle specifying the component value placed in the B component of the output vector.
trans-unit.target: b 是VkComponentSwizzle，指定放置在输出矢量的B分量中的分量值。

trans-unit.source: bmust be a valid VkComponentSwizzle value
trans-unit.target: b 必须是有效的VkComponentSwizzle值

trans-unit.source: backmust be a valid VkStencilOpState structure
trans-unit.target: back 必须是有效的 VkStencilOpState 结构

trans-unit.source: baseArrayLayer ≥ 0
trans-unit.target: baseArrayLayer ≥0

trans-unit.source: baseArrayLayer = 0
trans-unit.target: baseArrayLayer = 0

trans-unit.source: baseArrayLayer and layerCount are members of the subresourceRange member.
trans-unit.target: baseArrayLayer 和 layerCount 是成员 subresourceRange 构件。

trans-unit.source: baseArrayLayer and layerCount are the starting layer and number of layers to copy.
trans-unit.target: baseArrayLayer 和 layerCount 是要复制的起始层和层数。

trans-unit.source: baseArrayLayer is the first array layer accessible to the view.
trans-unit.target: baseArrayLayer 是视图可访问的第一个数组层。

trans-unit.source: baseArrayLayer is the first layer to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: baseArrayLayer 是要清除的第一层。

trans-unit.source: baseMipLevel is the first mipmap level accessible to the view.
trans-unit.target: baseMipLevel 是视图可访问的第一个mipmap级别。

trans-unit.source: basePipelineHandle is a pipeline to derive from
trans-unit.target: basePipelineHandle 是从中派生的管道

trans-unit.source: basePipelineHandle is a pipeline to derive from.
trans-unit.target: basePipelineHandle 是要派生的管道。

trans-unit.source: basePipelineIndex is an index into the pCreateInfos parameter to use as a pipeline to derive from
trans-unit.target: basePipelineIndex 是 pCreateInfos 参数的索引，用作从中派生的管道

trans-unit.source: basePipelineIndex is an index into the pCreateInfos parameter to use as a pipeline to derive from.
trans-unit.target: basePipelineIndex 是 pCreateInfos 参数的索引，用作从中派生的管道。

trans-unit.source: bindCount is the number of VkSparseImageMemoryBind structures in pBinds array
trans-unit.target: bindCount 是pBinds数组中 VkSparseImageMemoryBind 结构的数量

trans-unit.source: bindCount is the number of VkSparseMemoryBind structures in the pBinds array.
trans-unit.target: bindCount 是 pBinds 数组中 VkSparseMemoryBind 结构的数量。

trans-unit.source: bindCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: bindCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: bindInfoCount is the number of elements in the pBindInfo array.
trans-unit.target: bindInfoCount 是 pBindInfo 数组中元素的数量。

trans-unit.source: binding is the binding number of this entry and corresponds to a resource of the same binding number in the shader stages.
trans-unit.target: binding 是此条目的绑定号，并且与着色器阶段中具有相同绑定号的资源相对应。

trans-unit.source: binding is the binding number that this structure describes.
trans-unit.target: binding 是此结构描述的绑定号。

trans-unit.source: binding is the binding number which this attribute takes its data from.
trans-unit.target: binding 是此属性从中获取其数据的绑定号。

trans-unit.source: bindingmust be less than VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxVertexInputBindings
trans-unit.target: binding 必须小于 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxVertexInputBindings

trans-unit.source: bindingCount is the number of elements in pBindings.
trans-unit.target: bindingCount 是pBindings中元素的 pBindings 。

trans-unit.source: bindingCount is the number of vertex input bindings whose state is updated by the command.
trans-unit.target: bindingCount 是其状态由命令更新的顶点输入绑定的数量。

trans-unit.source: bindingCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: bindingCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: blendConstants is an array of four values specifying the R, G, B, and A components of the blend constant color used in blending, depending on the blend factor.
trans-unit.target: blendConstants 是由四个值组成的数组，该值指定在混合中使用的混合常数颜色的R，G，B和A分量，具体取决于混合因子。

trans-unit.source: blendConstants is an array of four values used as the R, G, B, and A components of the blend constant that are used in blending, depending on the blend factor.
trans-unit.target: blendConstants 是由四个值组成的数组，这些值用作混合中的混合常数的R，G，B和A分量，具体取决于混合因子。

trans-unit.source: blendEnable controls whether blending is enabled for the corresponding color attachment. If blending is not enabled, the source fragment’s color for that attachment is passed through unmodified.
trans-unit.target: blendEnable 控制是否为相应的颜色附件启用混合。如果未启用混合，则该附件的源片段的颜色将未经修改地传递。

trans-unit.source: borderColor is a VkBorderColor value specifying the predefined border color to use.
trans-unit.target: borderColor 是VkBorderColor值，用于指定要使用的预定义边框颜色。

trans-unit.source: buffer is a VkBuffer on which the view will be created.
trans-unit.target: buffer 是将在其上创建视图的 VkBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: buffer is a handle to the buffer whose backing memory is affected by the barrier.
trans-unit.target: buffer 是缓冲区的句柄，其后备内存受屏障影响。

trans-unit.source: buffer is the VkBuffer object to be bound.
trans-unit.target: buffer 是要绑定的 VkBuffer 对象。

trans-unit.source: buffer is the buffer being bound.
trans-unit.target: buffer 是绑定的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: buffer is the buffer containing dispatch parameters.
trans-unit.target: buffer 是包含调度参数的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: buffer is the buffer containing draw parameters.
trans-unit.target: buffer 是包含绘制参数的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: buffer is the buffer resource.
trans-unit.target: buffer 是缓冲区资源。

trans-unit.source: buffer is the buffer to be attached to memory.
trans-unit.target: buffer 是要附加到内存的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: buffer is the buffer to destroy.
trans-unit.target: buffer 是要销毁的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: buffer is the buffer to query.
trans-unit.target: buffer 是要查询的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: buffermust be a valid VkBuffer handle
trans-unit.target: buffer 必须是有效的 VkBuffer 句柄

trans-unit.source: buffermust have been created with a usage value containing at least one of VK_BUFFER_USAGE_UNIFORM_TEXEL_BUFFER_BIT or VK_BUFFER_USAGE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER_BIT
trans-unit.target: buffer 必须已经与创建 usage 含有至少一个值 VK_BUFFER_USAGE_UNIFORM_TEXEL_BUFFER_BIT 或 VK_BUFFER_USAGE_STORAGE_TEXEL_BUFFER_BIT

trans-unit.source: buffermust have been created with the VK_BUFFER_USAGE_INDEX_BUFFER_BIT flag
trans-unit.target: buffer 必须使用 VK_BUFFER_USAGE_INDEX_BUFFER_BIT 标志创建缓冲区

trans-unit.source: buffermust have been created with the VK_BUFFER_USAGE_INDIRECT_BUFFER_BIT bit set
trans-unit.target: buffer 必须已将 VK_BUFFER_USAGE_INDIRECT_BUFFER_BIT 位置1 来创建缓冲区

trans-unit.source: buffermust have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: buffer 必须已从 device 创建，分配或检索缓冲区

trans-unit.source: buffermust not already be backed by a memory object
trans-unit.target: buffer 必须尚未由内存对象支持

trans-unit.source: buffermust not have been created with any sparse memory binding flags
trans-unit.target: buffer 必须未使用任何稀疏内存绑定标志创建缓冲区

trans-unit.source: bufferBindCount is the number of sparse buffer bindings to perform in the batch.
trans-unit.target: bufferBindCount 是要在批处理中执行的稀疏缓冲区绑定的数量。

trans-unit.source: bufferFeatures is a bitmask of VkFormatFeatureFlagBits specifying features supported by buffers.
trans-unit.target: bufferFeatures 是VkFormatFeatureFlagBits的位掩码，用于指定缓冲区支持的功能。

trans-unit.source: bufferImageGranularity is the granularity, in bytes, at which buffer or linear image resources, and optimal image resources can be bound to adjacent offsets in the same VkDeviceMemory object without aliasing. See Buffer-Image Granularity for more details.
trans-unit.target: bufferImageGranularity 是缓冲区或线性图像资源以及最佳图像资源可以以字节为单位的粒度，可以将其绑定到同一 VkDeviceMemory 对象中的相邻偏移量而无需混叠。有关更多详细信息，请参见缓冲区图像粒度。

trans-unit.source: bufferImageHeightmust be 0, or greater than or equal to the height member of imageExtent
trans-unit.target: bufferImageHeight 必须为 0 或大于或等于 imageExtent 的 height 成员

trans-unit.source: bufferMemoryBarrierCount is the length of the pBufferMemoryBarriers array.
trans-unit.target: bufferMemoryBarrierCount 是 pBufferMemoryBarriers 数组的长度。

trans-unit.source: bufferOffset is the offset in bytes from the start of the buffer object where the image data is copied from or to.
trans-unit.target: bufferOffset 是从缓冲区对象的起始位置（以字节为单位）的偏移量，图像数据是从该对象复制或复制到的。

trans-unit.source: bufferOffset, bufferRowLength, bufferImageHeight and all members of imageOffset and imageExtentmust respect the image transfer granularity requirements of the queue family that it will be submitted against, as described in Physical Device Enumeration
trans-unit.target: bufferOffset ， bufferRowLength ， bufferImageHeight 以及 imageOffset 和 imageExtent 的所有成员必须遵守将要针对其提交的队列系列的图像传输粒度要求，如物理设备枚举中所述

trans-unit.source: bufferOffsetmust be a multiple of 4
trans-unit.target: bufferOffset 必须为 4 的倍数

trans-unit.source: bufferRowLength and bufferImageHeight specify the data in buffer memory as a subregion of a larger two- or three-dimensional image, and control the addressing calculations of data in buffer memory. If either of these values is zero, that aspect of the buffer memory is considered to be tightly packed according to the imageExtent.
trans-unit.target: bufferRowLength 和 bufferImageHeight 将缓冲存储器中的数据指定为较大的二维或三维图像的子区域，并控制缓冲存储器中数据的寻址计算。如果这些值中的任何一个为零，则根据 imageExtent 认为缓冲存储器的该方面已紧密打包。

trans-unit.source: bufferRowLengthmust be 0, or greater than or equal to the width member of imageExtent
trans-unit.target: bufferRowLength 必须为 0 或大于或等于 imageExtent 的 width 成员

trans-unit.source: bufferView is the buffer view to destroy.
trans-unit.target: bufferView 是要销毁的缓冲区视图。

trans-unit.source: clearValue is the color or depth/stencil value to clear the attachment to, as described in Clear Values below.
trans-unit.target: clearValue 是用于清除附件的颜色或深度/模板值，如下面的“ 清除值”中所述。

trans-unit.source: clearValuemust be a valid VkClearValue union
trans-unit.target: clearValue 必须是有效的 VkClearValue 联合

trans-unit.source: clearValueCount is the number of elements in pClearValues.
trans-unit.target: clearValueCount 是pClearValues中的元素 pClearValues 。

trans-unit.source: clearValueCountmust be greater than the largest attachment index in renderPass that specifies a loadOp (or stencilLoadOp, if the attachment has a depth/stencil format) of VK_ATTACHMENT_LOAD_OP_CLEAR
trans-unit.target: clearValueCount 必须比在最大附着指数大于 renderPass ，指定一个 loadOp （或 stencilLoadOp ，如果附件具有深度/模板格式）的 VK_ATTACHMENT_LOAD_OP_CLEAR

trans-unit.source: codeSize is the size, in bytes, of the code pointed to by pCode.
trans-unit.target: codeSize 是pCode指向的代码的大小（以字节为 pCode 。

trans-unit.source: codeSizemust be a multiple of 4
trans-unit.target: codeSize 必须是4的倍数

trans-unit.source: codeSizemust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: codeSize 必须大于0

trans-unit.source: color specifies the color image clear values to use when clearing a color image or attachment.
trans-unit.target: color 指定在清除彩色图像或附件时要使用的彩色图像清除值。

trans-unit.source: colorAttachment is only meaningful if VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_COLOR_BIT is set in aspectMask, in which case it is an index to the pColorAttachments array in the VkSubpassDescription structure of the current subpass which selects the color attachment to clear. If colorAttachment is VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED then the clear has no effect.
trans-unit.target: colorAttachment 仅当在 VK_IMAGE_ASPECT_COLOR_BIT 中设置了 aspectMask ，colorAttachment才有意义。在这种情况下，它是当前子通道的VkSubpassDescription结构中 pColorAttachments 数组的索引，用于选择要清除的颜色附件。如果 colorAttachment 为 VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED ,则清除无效。
